teems Ghräkeems wairs nhe Kallpoyam. Aiſto kas nomirris
gir / tas gir taißnohtz no Ghräkeems. Bett äſẜam
mehß ar CHriſto mirruſchi / tad titzam mehß / ka
mehß arridſan ar to dſiewohſẜim / vnd ſinnam / ka CHriſtus
no teems mirroņeems vsmohdenahtz / nu wairs nhe
mirrſt ta Nahwe joproyam wairahk par to nhe walldieß
/ aiſto ko tas mirris gir / to gir tas to Ghräko Dehļ
mirris ween reis / bett ko tas dſiewo / to dſiewo tas Deewam.
Ta juhß arridſan / turraitees jums par tahdeems /
ka juhß no teems Ghräkeems nomirruſchi eſẜeeta / vnd
Deewam dſiewoyeeta / eekſchan JEſu CHriſto muhſẜu
Kungu.
Evangelium am ſechſten Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis / Matth. 5.
JEſus ẜatziya vs teems Ļaudeems vnd vs ẜaweems
Mahzekļeems : Es ẜacku jums / ja juhſẜa Taißniba
nhe gir labbaka ka to Raxtamahzetayo vnd Wariſeeŗo
/ tad juhß eekſchan tahß Däbbäſẜo=wallſtibas nhe
nahxeeta.Juhß eſẜeta dſirrdeyuſchi
/ ka teems Wätzakeems
ẜatzietz gir / Töw nhe
buhß Nokaut.Bett kas Nokaw
/ tas buhß to Ꞩohdibu
nopellniyis. Bett es ẜacku
jums / kas ar ẜawu Brahli
dußmo / tas gir to Ꞩohdibu
nopellniyis / bett kas vs ẜawu
Brahli ẜacka / Racha / tas gir tahß Runnas nopellniyis.
Bett kas ẜacka / tu Jegkis / tas gir to Elles Vgguni
nopellniyis.
Tapehtz kad tu tawu Dahwanu vs to Alltari vppere
/ vnd tu ee=ghadayees / ka töw ar tawu Brahli kas
ja=darra gir / tad attſtah turr preekſchan to Alltari tawu
dahwanu / vnd noey pirrmahk / vnd ẜadderrees ar tawu
Brahli / vnd nahtz tad / vnd vppere tawu Dahwanu.
Eſẜi labprahtiex tawam Prettibneekam dries / teekams
tu wehl wirſẜon ſcho czeļļu eſẜi / ka töw tas Prettibneex
weenreis nhe nodohd tam Ꞩohgam / vnd tas Ꞩohgis
nodohd töw tam Ꞩullaiņam / vnd tu tohpi Czetumà
eemäſtz. Es ẜacku töw pattees / tu no turrenes nhe iß=eeſẜi /
pirrms tu to pehdigu Kauſẜu maxahſẜi.
Epiſtel am ſiebenden Sontage nach Trini-
tatis / Rom. 6. Cap.
MYeļi / Brahļi / mann buhß pehtz Czillwehzigu dabbu
runnaht / tapehtz ka juhſẜa Meeſẜa wahya gir.
Jhten ka juhß juhſẜus Lohzekļus paddewuſchi eſẜeeta par
Kallpoſchanu tahß Nheſkieſtibas / vnd no weenas Nhetaißnibas
py ohtras: Ta padohdeeta nu arridſan juhſẜus
Lohzekļus py Kallpoſchanas tai Taißnibai / ka tee
ſwähti tohp. Aiſto kad juhß to Ghräko Kallpi biyaht /
tad biyaht juhß ſwabbadi no tahß Taißnibas / kahdus
augļus juhß to briedi dabbuyaht / par kattreems juhß nu
kaunahtees? Aiſto tas ghalls to paſſcho gir ta Nahwe.
Bett ka juhß nu no teems Ghräkeems ſwabbadi eſẜeeta /
vnd Deewa Kallpi tappuſchi / gir jums juhſẜi augļi / ka
juhß swähti tohpaht / bett tas ghalls gir ta muhſchiga
dſiewoſchana : Aiſto ta Nahwe gir to Ghräko Allga /
bett tas Deewa Dahwans gir ta muhſchiga dſiewoſchana
eekſchan CHriſto JEſu muhſẜu Kungu.
Evangelism am ſiebenden Sontage nach
Trinitatis / Marc. 8.
TAnny laikà / kad turr dauds Ļaudis by / vnd teems
nhe by ja=ähd / peeẜautze JESVS ẜawus Mahzekļus
py ẜöw / vnd ẜatziya vs teems / Mann gir tick
ſchähl to Ļauſcho / aiſto tee gir nu tries Deenas py
mann pallickuſchi / vnd teems nhe gir nhe neeka ja=ähd.
Vnd ja es tohß nheähduſchus no mann attlaiſtu / tad tee
vs czeļļu baddu nomirrtu / aiſto czitti by no tahlenes attnahkuſchi.
Winja Mahzekļi adbilldeya tam / kur jämmam
mehß ſcheitan Maiſes Tuxneſẜy / ka mehß tohß pee=ähdenayam?
Vnd wings jautaya teems: Czeek Maiſes gir
jums? Tee ẜatziya / Ꞩeptingi.
Vnd wings pawehleya
teems Ļaudeems / ka tee
ẜöw wirſẜon Semmes paſẜehſt
by. Vnd wings jehme
tohß ẜeptingas Maiſes /
vnd patteitze / vnd pahrlauſe
tahß / vnd dewe tahß
ẜaweems Mahzekļeems /
ka tee tahß paſſchas preekſcha czälltu / vnd tee czehle tahß
teems Ļaudeems preekſcha.Vnd teems by magkeniet Siwitingi
/ vnd wings patteitze / vnd pawehleya tohß paſſchus
arridſan preekſcha neſt. Bett tee ähde / vnd pee=ähde
/ vnd ẜalaſẜiya tahß attlickuſchas Druſkas / ẜeptingus
Kurrwus / vnd to by py tſchettri=tuxtoſchi / kattri turr ähduſchi
by. Vnd wings attlaide tohß no ẜöw.
Epiſtel am achten Sontage nach Trinitatis /
Rom. 8.
MJeļi Brahļi / Mehß äſẜam Parradneeki / nhe tahß
Meeſẜas / ka mums pehtz to Meeſẜu dſiewoht buhß /
aiſto ja juhß pehtz to Meeſẜu dſiewohſẜeeta / tad juhß mirrſẜeeta.
Bett ja juhß czaur to Gharru tahß Meeſẜas darrbu
ſlahpehſẜeeta / tad juhß dſiewohſẜeeta. Aiſto kattrus
tas Deewa Gharrs dſänn / tee gir Deewa Bährni. Aiſto
juhß nhe eſẜeeta kahdu Kallpa Gharru dabbuyuſchi /
ka jums attkal ja=bieſtahß / bett juhß eſẜeeta weenu Bährna
Gharru dabbuyuſchi / czaur kattru mehß ẜautzam /
Abba / mieļais Tähws. Tas pattz Gharrs dohd muhſẜam
Gharram leezibu / ka mehß Deewa Bährni äſẜam.
Äſẜam mehß tad Bährni / tad äſẜam mehß arridſan
Mannteneeki / ar wahrdu / Deewa Mannteneeki / vnd
Lieds=mannteneeki CHriſti / ja mehß tickai liedſe czeetieſẜim
/ ka mehß arridſan liedſe py Ghohdibas pa=auxtenati
tohpam.
Evangelium am achten Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis / Matth. 7.
JESVS ẜatziya
vs teems Ļaudeems
vnd vs ẜaweems Mahzekļeems
/ ẜarrghayeetees par
teems willtigeems Proweeteems
/ kattri Awya drehbehß
py jums nahk / bett no
eekſchanas gir tee pleſẜigi
Willki. Py winja augļeems
buhß jums tohß atſiet. Warrieg arridſan kaßlabban
Wiena=ohgus laſẜiet no teems Ehrſcheems ? Jeb Wieges
no teems dadſcheems? Aiſto ickkattris labbs kohx näß
labbus augļus / bett weens ẜappuwis kohx näß nicknus
augļus. Weens labbs kohx nhe warr nicknus augļus
neſt / vnd weens ẜappuwis kohx nhe warr labbus augļus
neſt. Jck kattris kohx / katters labbus augļus nhe näß /
tohp nozirrſts / vnd Vgguny ee=mäſts. Tapehtz py winja
augļeems buhß jums tohß attſiet. Nhe wiſẜi tee / kattri
vs mann ẜacka / Kunx / Kunx / eekſchan Däbbäſẜo=wallſtibas
nahx / bett tee / kattri to darra / ko manns Tähws
Debbeſẜies ghribb. Dauds vs mann ẜatzies winjà Deenà
/ Kunx / Kunx / nhe äſẜam mehß tawà Wahrdà nahkoſchas
leetas papreekſch ſatziyuſchi ? Nhe äſẜam mehß tawà
Wahrdà Wällus ißdſinnuſchi ? Nhe äſẜm mehß tawà
Wahrdà dauds darrbus darriyuſchi? Tad es vs teems
ẜatzieſchu : Es nhe äßmu juhß wehl muhſcham atſinnis /
Attkahpeeta no mann wiſẜi juhß Ļaundarritayi.
Epiſtel am neundten Soltage nach Trini-
tatis / 1. Corinth 10.
MJeļi Brahļi / Nhe tohpeeta Ällkadeewa Kallpi /
ihten ka czitti no winjeems tappa / ka turr raxtietz
ſtahw: Tee Ļaudis paſähdeyahß py ähſchanas vnd dſerrſchanas
/ vnd czehlehß aukſcham meeßlohtes. Nhe laideeta
mums arridſan nhe kahdu Mauzibu dſieth / ka czitti
no winjeems Mauzibu dſinna / vnd kritta weenà Deena
diwideßmitti / vnd tries tuhxtoſchi. Bett nhe laideeta
mums arridſan Chriſtum kahrdenaht / ka czitti no teems
to kahrdenaya / vnd tappa no teems Ohdſehms nomehrdäti.
Nhe kurrneyeeta arridſan / lieds ka czitti no teems
kurrneya / vnd tappa nomahkti no to nomährdätayu.
Schiß noticka wis winjeems par preekſchſiem / bett
tas gir raxtietz mums par Attghadaſchanu / vs kattreems
tas ghalls tahß Paſẜaules nahzis gir. Tapehtz kas ſkeetahß
/ wings ſtahwohtz / tas warr labb peeluhkoht / ka tas
nhe krieth. Wehl jums nhe kahda ka ween Czillwehziga
Kahrdenaſchana pahrghayuſẜi gir . Bett Deews gir peetitziex
/ katters juhß nhe leek kahrdenaht par juhſẜu ſpähku /
bett darra tha / ka ta kahrdenaſchana tahdu ghallu jämm /
ka juhß to warreeta paneſt. Tapehtz manni myeļi / behdſeeta
no to ällkadeewigu buſchanu.
Evangelium am neundten Sontage nach
Trinitatis / Lue. 16.
JESus ẜatziya vs ẜaweems
mahzekleems:
Turr by weens baggahtz
Wiers / tam by weens nammaturrätays
/ tas tappa
preekſchan winju aprunnahtz
/ ka buhtu tas tam winja
Mantu ißpohſtiyis. Vnd
wings aitzenaya to / vnd ẜatziya vs to: Ko dſirrſchu es no
töw? Dohd laghadibu no tawas Nammaturreſchanas /
aiſto tu nhe warri nu joproyam weens Nammaturretais
wairs buht. Tas Nammaturretais runnaya py ẜöw
paſſcham / ko buhß mann darrieth ? Manns Kunx jämm
to Nammaturreſchanu no mann. Rackt mann nhe ghribbahß
/ es kaunohß arridſan deedeleht. Es ghann ſinnu / ko
es ghribbu darrieth / kad es no to Ammatu no czälltz tohpu
/ ka tee mann ẜawahß Nammahß ee=jämm.
Vnd tas aitzenaya py ẜöw wiſẜus Paraddneekus ẜawa
Kunga / vnd ẜatziya vs to pirrmo: Czeek eſẜi tu mannam
Kungam parradà? Wings ẜatziya: Ꞩimbt Mutzus
Olye. Vnd tas ẜatziya vs winju: Jemm tawu Ghramatu /
ẜehdees / vnd raxti tudeļļ peezedeßmittz. Pehtz to ẜatziya tas
vs to Ohtru: Bett tu / czeek dauds eſẜi tu parradà? Wings
ẜatziya: Simbts mähru Queſcho. Vnd tas ẜatziya vs winju:
Jemm tawu Ghramatu / vnd raxti aſtoņ=deßmitz. Vnd
tas Kunx teitze to nhetaißnu Nammaturrätayu / ka tas
ghuddrige darriyis by. Aiſto tee bährni ſchahß Paſẜaules
gir ghuddraki / nhe ka tee Bährni tahß Ghaiſſchumas /
eekſchan ẜawu Raddu. Vnd es ẜacku jums arridſan / darraita
jums arridſan Draugus ar to nhetaißnu manntu /
ka tad kad jums peetruhxt / tee juhß vsjämm eekſchan to
muhſchigu Dſiewohklu.
Epiſtel am gehenden Sontage nach Trinita-
tis / 1. Corinth. 12.
MJeļi Brahļi / no teems Gharrigheems dahwaneems
nhe ghribbu es jums paſlept. Juhß ſinnaht
/ ka juhß Paggaņi eſẜeeta biyuſchi / vnd noghayuſchi
py teems mähmeems Ällkadeeweems / ka juhß tad wäſti
tappaht. Tapehtz buhß jums ſinnaht / ka nhe weenam
buhß JEſum nolahdeht / katters czaur to Deewa Gharru
runna. Vnd nhe weens nhe warr JEſum parr Kungu
ẜauckt / ka ween czaur to ſwätu Gharru.
Tur gir daſchadi Dahwani / bett tur gir weens
Gharrs / vnd tur gir daſchadi Ammati / bett tur gir weens
Kunx / vnd tur gir daſchada Spehziba / bett tur gir weens
Deews / katters ſtrahda wiſẜas leetas eekſchan wiſẜahms.
Eekſchan ick=kattru parahdahß ẜöw tahß dahwanas tha
Gharra / par labbu tai draudſei. Czittam tohp dohta
czaur to Gharru ta Runnaſchana (Walloda /) no tahß
Ghuddribas. Czittam tohp dohta ta Runnaſchana no
tahß Atſiſchanas pehtz to paſſchu Gharru / czittam ta
Titziba eekſchan to paſſchu Gharru / czittam ta dahwana
Wäſẜälu darriet eekſchan to paſſchu Gharru / czittam
Brienumus darriet / czittam Mahziſchana / czittam
Gharrus Jßpraſt / czittam daſchada Mehle / czittam
tahß mehles Jß=ſtahſtiet. Bett ſcho wiſẜu darra tas patz
weeniex Gharrs / vnd ißdalla ickweenam to Dahwanu /
ka tam pattiek.
Evangelium am zehenden Sontage nach
Trinitatis / Luc. 19.
KAd JEſus tuwe klaht py Jeruſalemes nahze / vsluhkoya
tas to Pili / vnd raudaya par to / vnd ẜatziya
/ Kad tu to ſinnatu / tad buhtu tu ſchinny tawà laikà arridſan
apdohmayuſẜi / kas py tawu Meeru wayadſätu.
Bett nu gir tas preekſchan taweems Atzeems paſläptz.
Aiſto tas laix par töw nahx / ka tawi Waideneeki apkahrt
töw vnd taweems Bährneems ar töw / weenu Rattupili
apkahrt töw ẜittieß / töw apẜehdehß / vnd wiſẜahß mallahß
ſpaidieß / vnd töw ſkieſt iß=pohſtieß / vnd nhe weenu
Ackmini vs ohtru atſtahß / tapehtz / ka tu nhe eſẜi attſinnuſẜi
to laiku / kad tu peemäckläta eſẜi. Vnd wings ghaya
Baſnizà / vnd eeẜahka
ißdſiet / kattri tur eekſchan
pahrdewe vnd pirrka / vnd
ẜatziya vs teems / tur ſtahw
raxtietz / Mans Namms
gir weens Pahtaronam̃s /
bett juhß eſẜeeta to par weenu
ſläppkawo beddri darriyuſchi.
Vnd mahziya ick Deenas Baſnizà. Bett tee
Auxtibaſnizaskungi vnd Raxtemahzetayi / vnd tee Prahwaki
ſtarrpan teems Ļaudeems / ghadaya / ka tee to Nokautu
/ vnd nhe attradda ka teems darrieth by. Aiſto wiſẜi
Ļaudis peekehrehß tam / vnd dſirrdeya to.
MJeļi Brahļi / es attminnu jums to Ewangelium /
ko es jums paſluddenayis äßmu / kattru juhß arridſan
vsjämuſchi eſẜeeta / eekſchan kattru juhß arridſan
ſtahweeta / czaur kattru juhß arridſan ſwähti tohpeeta
/ ka es jums to paſluddenayis äßmu / ja juhß tickai
to patturreyuſchi eſẜeeta / tas warr tad buht / ka juhß wellte
buhtat titzeyuſchi. Aiſto es äßmu jums papreekſch to
dewis / kattru es arridſan dabbuyis äßmu / ka CHriſtus
nomirris gir muhſẜo Ghräko dehļ / pehtz to Raxtu / vnd
ka tas apracktz gir / vnd ka tas attkall aukſcham czehleeß
gir / treſſchà Deenà / pehtz to Raxtu. Vnd ka tas gir
rädſähtz no Keewas / pehtz no teems Diwipaddeßmitteems.
Pehtz gir tas rädſähtz no wairahk nhe ka peezeẜimbteems
Brahļeems weenà reiſà / no teems paſſcheems
wehl dauds dſiewo / bett czitti gir aismigguſchi.
Pehtz gir tas rädſahtz no Jacobu / pehtz no wiſẜeems
Apuſtuļeems. Wiß pehdige pehtz wiſẜeems gir tas arridſan
no man / ka no kahdu nhelaizigu dſimbtibu rädſähtz.
Aiſto es äßmu tas ſämmakais no teems Apuſtuļeems /
katters es nhe äßmu czeeniex / ka mann par Apuſtuli
ẜautz / tapehtz / ka es to Deewa Draudſibu pullghayis
äßmu. Bett no Deewa ſchälaſtibas äßmu es / kas es
äßmu / vnd winja ſchäläſtiba py mann nhe gir wellte biyuſẜi.
Bett es äßmu dauds wairahk ſtradayis / nhe ka tee
wiſẜi. Bett nhe es / bett Deewa ſchäläſtiba / kattra eekſchan
mann gir.
Evangelium am eilfften Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis / Luc. 18.
JEſus ẜatziya wißwairahk vs teems / kattri ſkittahß
taißni äſẜoſchi / vnd nitzinaya czittus / ſchadu liedſibu:
Diwi Czillwäki noghaya aukſcham Baſnizà Pahtarus
ſkaitiet / weens by weens Wariſeeris / ohters weens
Muiteneex. Tas Wariſeeris
ſtahweya / vnd ſkaitiya
py ẜöw paſſcham tha: Es
patteitſchu töw Deews / ka
es nhe äßmu ka czitti Laudis
/ Laupitayi / Nhetaißni /
Ļaulibas=pahrlauſetayi /
jeb arridſan ka ſchiß Muiteneex.
Es ghaweyu diwireis
nedeļļà / vnd dohmu to Deßmittu no wiſẜu kas
mann gir.
Vnd tas Muiteneex ſtahweya no tahlenes / neds
ghribbeya ẜawas Atzis paczellt vs Däbbäſẜu / bett ẜitta
preekſchan ẜawu Kruhti / vnd ſatziya: Deews eſẜi mann
Ghrehzeneekam ſchehliex. Es ẜacku jums / Schiß noghaya
ſemmeh taißnis ẜawa Nammà preekſch winyu. Aiſto
kas ſöw patz auxtenayahß / tas tohp ſämmohtz / vnd
kas ſöw patz ſämmoyahß / tas tohp pa=auxtenahtz.
Epiſtel am zwölfften Sontage nach Trinita-
tis / 2. Corinth. 3.
MJeļi Brahļi / tada peetitziba gir mums czaur
CHriſtum py Deewu / nhe ta / ka mehß ko labb
därram no mums paſſcheems kahdu leetu apdohmaht /
ihten ka no mums paſſcheems: Bett ko mehß därram /
tas gir no Deewu / katters mums arridſan czeenigus darriyis
gir / to Ammatu tahß jaunas Eeſtadiſchanas ſtrahdaht
/ nhe ta Baußla / bett ta Gharra. Aiſto tas Baußlis
nokau / bett tas Gharrs darra dſiewus.
Bett ja tam Ammatam / katters czaur to Baußlu
nokaw / vnd eekſchan teems Ackminņeems eſiemohtz gir /
ſkaidriba by / ka tee Bährni Jſrael nhe warreya vsluhkoht
to waighu Moſi / tahß ſkaidribas dehļ winya Waigha
/ kattra mittahß / ka nhe by tad dauds wairahk tam
Ammatam / katters to Gharru dohd / ſkaidriba buht?
Aiſto ka nu tam Ammatam / katters to Paſuſſchanu
mahza / ſkaidriba gir / wehl dauds wairahk gir tam Ammatam
/ katters to Taißnibu mahza / ſpehziga ſkaidriba.
Evangelium am zwölfften Sontage nach
Trinitatis / Marci 7. Cap.
KAd JEſus atkal ißghaya no teems Eſcheems Tyri
vnd Sydon / nahze tas py to Galileero Juhri / widdu
ſtarpan teems Eſcheems to deßmitto Pilo. Vnd tee
neſẜe weenu Kurrlu py to / tas by Mähms. Vnd tee luhdſe
to / ka tas ẜawas Rohkas vs to licktu. Vnd tas jehme
to no teems Ļaudeems ẜawißke
py mallas / vnd licka
tam tohß pirrxtus Auſẜies /
vnd iß=ſpļahwe / vnd aiſkare
winja Mehl / vnd ſkattiyahß
vs Däbbäſſu / nopuhtehß
vnd ẜatziya vs to: Hephetah
/ tas gir / attwerrees.
Vnd tudeļļ attwehrehß
winja Auſẜis / vnd tas Ꞩaitz winja Mehles tappa
Ꞩwabbatz / vnd runnaya pareiſe. Vnd wings aißleedſe
teems / teems nhe by to nhe weenam ẜatziet. Bett jo wings
wairahk aißleedſe / jo tee wairahk ißpaude / vnd iſẜabrienoyahß
parr to ļohte / vnd ẜatziya: Tas gir wiſẜas leetas
labbe darriyis / tohß Kurrlus gir tas dſirrdoſchus darriyis
/ vnd tohß Mähmus runnayoſchus.
Epiſtel am dreyzehenden Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis / Gal. 3.
MYļi Brahļi / es ghribbu vs Czillwehzigu dabbu
runnaht. Nhe weens nitzina weena Czillwäka Eeſtadiſchanu
(kad ta apſtipprenata gir) vnd nhe peeleek arridſan
nhe neeka. Nu gir jo ta ẜohliſchana tam Abrahamam
/ vnd winja Sähklai ẜohlita. Tas nhe ẜacka / eekſchan
teems Ꞩähkleems / ka czaur dauds / bett ka czaur weenu:
Czaur tawu Ꞩähklu / katters gir CHriſtus. Bett es
ẜacku no to / ta Eeſtadiſchana kattra no Deewu papreekſch
apſtipprenata gir / vs CHriſtum / nhe tohp ißdſähſta
/ ka tai Ꞩohliſchanai by czaur to Baußlu miſt /
alij
mittehtees) katters dohtz gir par tſchettreẜimbteems
vnd trießdeßmitteems Ghaddeems. Aiſto ja ta Bährna
Mañtiba czaur to Baußlu nopellnita taptu / tad nhe taptu
ta czaur to Ꞩohliſchanu dohta. Bett Deews gir tam
Abrahamam to czaur to Ꞩohliſchanu wellte ee=ſkiņņkoyis.
Ko buhß tad tam Baußlam? Tas gir klaht pee=nahzis
to Ghrähko dehļ teekam ka ta Ꞩähkla nahktu / tam kattram
ta Ꞩohliſchana notickuſẜi gir / vnd gir ißtaiſẜietz no
teems Engeļeems czaur to Rohku tha Widdetaya / bett
weens Widdetais nhe gir weena weeniga Widdetais bett
Deews gir weeniex. KasKa? gir tad tas Baußlis pretty Deewa
ẜohliẜchanu? Tas nhe=warr buht. Bett ja kahtz Baußlis
buhtu dohtz / kas warrätu dſiewus darriet / tad nahktu
ta Taißniba pattees no to Baußlu. Bett tas Raxtz gir
wiſẜus nolitzis appackſchan teems Ghräkeems / ka ta
Ꞩohliẜchana nahktu / czaur to Titzibu eekſchan CHriſto
JEſu / teems dohta / kattri titz.
Evangelium am dreyzehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Luc. 10.
JEſus attghreeſehß ẜöw vs ẜaweems Mahzekļeems /
vnd ẜatziya itt ihpaſſch: Swähtas gir tahß Atzis /
kattras räds / ko juhß rädſaht. Aiſto es ẜacku jums / dauds
Proweetes vnd Koningi ghribbeya redſeht / ka juhß rädſaht
/ vnd nhe gir redſeyuſchi / vnd dſirrdeht / ko juhß dſirrdaht
/ vnd nhe gir dſirrdeyuſchi.
Vnd reds / tad czehlehß
aukſcham weens Raxta=
mahzetayß / ghribbädams
to ißklauſẜiet ẜatziya: Meiſteri
/ ko buhß mann darrieth
/ ka es to muhſchigu
Dſiewoſchanu dabbu ?
Bett wings ẜatziya vs to:
Ka ſtahw Baußly raxtietz?
Ka laſẜi tu ? Tas attbilldeya vnd ẜatziya / Töw buhß Deewu
tawu Kungu mieļoht / no wiſẜas Ꞩirrdtz / no wiſẜu
Dwehſẜeli / no wiſẜu Ꞩpähku / vnd no wiſẜu Prahtu / vnd
tawu Tuwaku ka ẜöw paſſchu. Bett wings ẜatziya vs
to: Tu eſẜi pareiſe adbilldeyis / darri to / tad tu dſiewohſẜi.
Bett tas ghribbädams ẜöw pattz taißnohtees / ẜatziya
vs JEſu: Kas gir tad manns Tuwakaiß? Tad
adbilldeya JEſus vnd ẜatziya / Turr by weens Czillwähx
/ tas ißghaya no Jeruſalemes vs Jericho / vnd
tam ghaddiyahß ſtarrp Släppkaweems / tee ißwillka
to / vnd kuhle to / vnd ghaya nohſt / vnd atſtahya to pus
nomirruſchu ghulloſchu. Bett tas lehzehß no nheyauſch /
ka weens Baſnizaskunx to paſſchu czeļļu ſtaighaya / vnd
kad tas nahze py to weetu / vnd redſeya to / paghaya tas
czätzen. Ta lieds arridſan weens Leewietz / kad tas nahze
py to weetu / vnd redſeya to / ghaya tas czätzen. Bett
weens Samariters ſtaighaya vnd nahze turr. Vnd
kad tas to redſeya / abſchäloyahß tas ẜöw par to / vnd peeghaya
py to / ẜaſẜehya tam winja Wahtes / vnd lähya tam
eekſchan Ölye vnd Wienu. Vnd czehle to vs ẜawu Lohpu /
vnd wedde to eekſchan Mahyaweetas / vnd peeluhkoya
to. Ohtrà Deenà brautze tas nohſt / vnd ißwilka diwi
Ghroſſchus / vnd dewe tohß tam Ꞩaimneekam / vnd ẜatziya
vs to: Ghlabba to / vnd ja tu ko wairahk ißdoſẜi / ghribbu
es töw to attmaxaht attee=dam̃s. Kattru ſkeetees tu /
no ſcheems trimm to Tuwaku äſẜam biyuſchu tam / kattram
ſtarrp Släppkaweems ghaddiyahß? Tas ẜatziya /
Tas / katters ſchälaſtibu tam darriya. Tad ẜatziya JEſus
vs to: Tad ey prohyam / vnd darri tha arridſan.
Epiſtel am vierzehenden Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis / Gal. 5.
MJeļi Brahļi / ſtaighayeeta eekſchan Gharru / tad
juhß tahß Meſẜas kahribu nhe peepilldieſẜeeta.
Aiſto tai Meeſẜi ghribbahß prettie to Gharru / vnd tam
Gharram prettie to Meeſẜu. Tee paſſchi gir weens prett
ohtru / ka juhß nhe darraht / ko juhß ghribbaht. Bett ja
jums tas Gharrs wallda / tad nhe eſẜeta juhß appackſchan
to Baußli. Bett tee darrbi tahß Meeſẜas gir ſinnami
/ ka turr gir Laulibas Pahrkahpſchana / Mauziba /
nheſkieſtiba / Beßkauniba / Ällkadeewiba / Burrwiba /
Eenaidiba / Bahrſchana / Eeniedeſchana / Dußmiba /
Reeſchana / Nheẜaddereſchana / nhelabba Mahziba /
Nhe ee=redſeſchana / Släppkawiba / Plieteſchana / Ryeſchana
/ vnd kas ta warr buht. No kattreems es jums
papreekſch ẜatziyis äßmu / vnd ẜacku wehl papreekſch / ka
tee / kattri to darra / to Deewa Wallſtibu par Bährna
manntibu nhe dabbuis.
Bett tee augļi tha Gharra gir / Myläſtiba / Liexmiba
/ Meers / Pazeeſchana / lehniba / laipniba / Titziba /
lähns=prahtzlähns=praptz / Skieſtiba / prettie tahdeems nhe gir tas
Baußlis. Bett kattri CHriſto / peedärr / tee ſlahpina
ẜawu Meeſẜu / arr to Kahrumu vnd eeghribbeſchanu.
Evangelium am vierzehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Luc. 17.
VNd tas notickahß / kad JEſus ghaya vs Jeruſalemes
/ ſtaighaya tas widdu czaur Samaria vnd
Galilea. Vnd kad wings
weenà Jellghawà nahze /
ẜattappa winjam deßmittz
Spittaligi Wieri / tee ſtahweya
no tahļenes / pazälldami
ẜawus Ballxnes ẜatziya:
JEſu / myļais Meiſteri
/ abſchäloyees töw par
mums. Vnd kad wings tohß redſeya / ẜatziya wings
vs teems: No eyta / vnd rahdaitees teems Baſnizas=
kungeems. Vnd tas notickahß kad tee noghaya / tappa
tee ſkieſti.
Bett weens no teems / rädſädams / ka tas by Wäſẜäls
tappis / attghreeſehß tas attkal apkahrt / vnd teitze
Deewu / ar ſkannigu ballxni / vnd kritta vs ẜawu Waigu
/ py winja kahyeems / vnd patteitze winjam. Vnd tas
by weens Samariters. Bett JEſus adbilldeya vnd ẜatziya
/ Nhegg gir turr deßmittz ſkieſti tappuſchi? Bett kur
gir tee dehwingi? Nhe gir tad czittz nhe weens attrahſts /
katters attkal attghreeſtohß / vnd dohtu Deewam Ghohdu
/ ka weens ſchis Sweſſcheneex? Vnd wings ẜatziya vs
to: Czellees aukſcham / ey prohyam / tawa Titziba gir
töw palliedſeyuſẜi.
Epiſtel am funffzehenden Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis / Gal. 6.
MJeļi Brahļi / ja mehß eekſchan Gharru dſiewoyam
/ tad laideeta mums arridſan eekſchan Gharru
ſtaighaht. Nhe laideeta mums pehtz to neezigu Ghohdu
kahrotees / neds dußmotees muhſẜo ſtarrpà / neds eeniedehtees.
Myļi Brahļi / ja kahtz Czillwähx no kahdas wainas
pahrſteicktz tohp / tad palliedſeeta tam attkal ar lehnprahtigu
Gharru / juhß kattri juhß Gharrigi eſẜeeta. Vnd
luhkoyees vs ẜöw paſſchu / ka tu arridſan nhe tohpi kahrdenahtz.
Weens laid pannäß ohtra Naßtu / tad juhß to
Baußlu CHriſti peepilldieeſẜeta. Bett ja kaßlabba domatu
/ täs äſẜohtz kas / vnd tas tomähr nhe gir nheneeka /
tas peewiļļahß ẜöw pattz. Bett ickweens laid luhko vs ẜawu
paſſchu darrbu / vnd tad buhß tam py ſöw paſſcham
Ghohtz / vnd nhe py czittu. Aiſto ick weens ẜawu Naßtu
neſẜies.
Bett tas kas pamahzietz tohp ar to Wahrdu / tam buhß
ißdallieth wiſẜu labbumu tam kas to pamahza. Nhe alloyeetees
/ Deews nhe leekahß apſmeetees. Aiſto ko tas
Czillwähx ẜeh / to tas pļaws. Kas vs to Meeſẜu ẜeh / tas no
to Meeſẜu to ẜamaitaſchanu pļaws. Bett kas vs to Gharru
ẜeh / tas no to Gharru to muhſchigu dſiewoſchanu
pļaws. Bett laideeta mums labbe darriet / vnd nhe peekuſt.
Aiſto ẜawà laikà mehß arridſan pļauſẜim bes mitteſchanas.
Kad mums nu laix gir / tad laideeta mums labbe
darrieth ick=kattram / bett wißwairahk py tahß titzibas
draugheems.
Evangelium am funffzehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Matth. 6.
JEſus ẜatziya vs teems Ļaudeems: Nhe weens nhe
warr diweems Kungeems kallpoht / jeb tam buhß
weenu ee=niedeht / vnd to ohtru mieļoht / jeb tam buhß weenam
peekehrtees / vnd to ohtru ee=niedeht. Juhß nhe warreeta
Deewam kallpoht vnd tam Mammoņam. Tapehtz
ẜacku es jums / Nhe ghadayeeta par juhſẜu Dſiewibu / ko
juhß ähdieſẜeeta vnd dſerrſẜeeta / neds arridſan par juhſẜu
Meeſẜu / ko juhß apwillxeeta. Negg gir ta Dſiewiba
labbaka nhe ka ta Barriba?
Vnd ta Meeſẜa labbaka
nhe ka tahß Drehbes.
Raughaita vs teems Puttneems
appackſchan to däbbäſẜu
/ Tee nhe ẜeh / tee nhe
pļaw / tee nhe ẜawädd Skuny
/ vnd juhſẜo Däbbäſẜo
Tähws barryo tohß tomähr.
Nhegg eſẜeeta juhß tad dauds labbaki nhe ka tee?
Kas gir juhſẜo ſtarrpa / katters ẜawai gharŗumai weenu
Ohleckti peelickt warr / jeb tas tadehļ ghann bähdayahß.
Vnd kapehtz ghadayeeta juhß par tahm Drehbem? Raughaita
vs teems Pugkeems wirß LaukuĻauku / ka tee aug. Tee
nhe ſtrahda / neds tee arridſan wehrp. Es ẜacku jums /
ka arridſan Salomons wiſẜà ẜawà Ghohdibà nhe gir
tha apghärbtz biyis / ka weens no teems paſſcheems. Ja
tad Deews to Sahl wirß Lauku tha apghärb / kattra
ſchodeen ſtahw / vnd riete Krahßny eemäſta tohp / negg by
tad tam to jums wehl wairahk darriet? O juhß wahyititzigi!
Tapehtz nhe buhß jums ghadaht / vnd ẜatziet: Ko
mehß ähdieſẜim / ko mehß Dſerrſẜim / ar ko mehß ẜöw
apgherbẜimees? Pehtz tahdu leetu ghada tee Paggaņi /
aiſto juhſẜo Däbbäſẜo Tähws ſinna / ka jums tahdas leetas
wayaga gir. Ghadayeeta wiß pirrmahk pehtz Deewa
Wallſtibas / vnd pehtz winja Taißnibas / tad jums
wiſẜas leetas peekrittis. Tapehtz nhe ghadayeeta par to
nahkoſchu Rietu / aiſto ta Rietasdeena par ẜöw paſſcham
ghadahß. Tas gir ghann / ka ick=kattrai Deeni ẜawas
paſſchas bähdas gir.
Epiſtel am ſechzehenden Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis / Epheſ. 3.
MYļi Brahļi / es luhdſcho / ka juhß nhe peekuhſtaht /
manno bähdo dehļ / kattrus es juſẜo dehļ czeeſcho /
kattri jums Ghodà gir. Tapehts lohku es ẜawus czeļļus
preekſchan to Tähwu muhſẜa Kunga JEſu CHriſti / katters
tas ihſtäns Tähws gir par wiſẜeems / kattri Tähws
dehwe / eekſchan Debbes vnd wirſẜu Semmes / ka tas
jums Spähku dohd pehts to Baggatibu ẜawas Ghodibas
/ ſtippreems tapt czaur ẜawu Gharru py to eekſchigu
Czillwäku / vnd CHriſtum dſiewoht czaur to Titzibu
juhſẜahß Syrdys / vnd czaur to Mylibu eeẜacknoti / vnd
eedibbinati tohpat / ka juhß ẜayembt warreeta ar wiſẜeems
Swähteems / kas gir tas Plattums / vnd tas Gharyums
/ vnd tas Dſiļļums / vnd ta Auxtiba. Arridſan adſiet
/ ka CHriſtum myļoht / dauds labbahke gir / nheka
wiß ſinnaht / ka juhß peepillditi tohpeeta ar wiſẜenahdu
Deewa pillnibu.
Bett tam / katters dauds wairahk darryht war par
wiſẜu / ko mehß luhdſam jeb ẜaprohtam / pehts to Spähku
/ katters eekſchan mums ſtrahda / tam gir Ghohdts eekſchan
tahß Draudſibas / kattra eekſchan CHriſto JEſu
gir / wiſẜà laikà / muhſchige / Amen.
Evangelium am ſechszehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Luc. 7.
VNd pehts to notickahß / ka JEſus weenà Pilly / ar
wahrdu Nain / ghaya / vnd dauds no winja Mahzekļeems
ghaya liedſe / vnd dauds Ļaudis. Bett kad
wings tuwe py Pillswahrteems nahze / Rauge / tad ißneſẜe
tee weenu Mirroni /
katters weens weeniex
Dähls ẜawas Mahtes
by / vnd tha by Attraitne.
Vnd dauds Pillsļaudis
ghaya ar tahß. Vnd kad to
tas Kunx redſeya / truhka
tam Ꞩirdts par tahß / vnd
ẜatziya vs tahß. Nhe raudi.
Vnd peeghaya / vnd aiſkahre to Mirronſkirrſtu /
vnd tee Neſẜeyi ſtahweya. Vnd wings ẜatziya / Puiſẜi /
es ẜacku töw / czelleeß aukſcham / vnd tas Puiſẜis czehlehß
aukſcham / vnd eeẜahka runnaht. Vnd wings eedewe
to ẜawai Mahtei. Vnd Biyaſchana pahrghaya
par wiſẜus / vnd teitze Deewu / vnd ẜatziya / Leels
Propeets muhſẜo ſtarpa gir pazehlees / vnd Deews gir
ẜawus Ļaudis apraudſiyis. Vnd ſchy Wallohda no
winju ißpauda par wiſſu Juddo Semm / vnd wiſẜahß
apkahrt ghullamahß Semmehß.
Epiſtel am ſiebenzehenden Sontage nach
Trinitatis / Eph. 4.
MYļi Braļi / Es Czeetumà buhdams eekſchan to
Kungu / peeminnu jums nu / ka juhß ſtaighayeeta
/ ka juhſẜai Aitzenaſchanai peeklayahß / eekſchan kattru
juhß aitzenati eſẜeeta / ar wiſẜu Sämmoſchanu vnd Lhenpratibu
/ ar Patzeeſchanu / vnd czeeteeta weens ohtru eekſchan
mileſtibas / vnd turraita no Ꞩirdts to Weenaidibu
Gharrà / czaur to Ꞩaitu ta Meera. Weena Meeſẜa / vnd
weens Gharrs / ka juhß arridſan aitzenati eſẜeeta / vs weenadigu
czerribu juhſẜas Aitzenaſchanas. Weens Kunx /
weena Titziba / weenà Chriſtiba / weens Deews vnd
Tähws (muhſẜo) wiſẜo / katters gir par jums wiſẜeems / vnd
czaur jums wiſẜeems / vnd eekſchan jums wiſẜeems.
Evangelium am ſiebenzehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Luc. 14.
VNd tas notickahß / ka JESVS nahze weena
Wirſẜeeneeka Nammà / Swehdeenà to Mais ähſt.
Vnd tee ghluneya vs winju. Vnd raugi / turr by weens
Czillwähx preekſchan winju / tas by Vdenaẜehrdſiex.
Vnd JEſus adbilldeya / vnd runnaya vs teems Raxta
Mazetayeems vnd Phariſeereems / vnd ẜatziya:
Arrieg peedärr Swehdeenà dſedenaht? Bett tee czeete
kluſẜe. Vnd wings jeme / vnd dſeedenaya to /
vnd pallaide to. Vnd adbilldeya / vnd ẜatziya vs
teems: Kas gir juhſẜo ſtarpà / kam ẜaws Wehrſẜis jeb
Eſelis Ackà eekriet / vnd
tas to tudeļ nhe ißwällk
Swehdeenà. Vnd tee nhe
warraya winjam nhe neeka
vs to atkal adbildeht.
Bett wings ẜatziya weenu
Liedſibu teems Weeſẜeems
/ nomannidams / ka
tee wehleyahß auxtakà wetà
ẜehdeht / vnd ẜatziya vs teems: Kad tu no weenu aitzenahts
kļuhſti Kahſahß / tad nhe ẜehdees auxtakà Weetà /
ka nhe nahx kahts czeenigahx / nhe ka tu / kas no winju
aitzenahts gir. Vnd kad tas tad nahk / kas töw vnd winju
aitzenayis gir / vs töw ẜacka / wirrẜees ſchim / vnd töw
buhß tad ar Kaunu ẜämmoyà weetà ẜehdeht. Bett kad
tu aitzenahts kļuhſti / tad no=ey / vnd ẜehdees ſämmoyà
weetà / kad tas nahk / kas töw aitzenayis gir / vs töw ẜacka:
Draux / wirrẜees aukſcham. Tad buhß töw Ghohdts
preekſchan teems / kattri ar töw py Ghalldu ẜehſch. Aiſto
kas ẜöw patz auxtenayahß / tam buhß ſämmotam tapt /
vnd kas ẜöw patz ſämmoyahß / tam buhß auxtenatam
tapt.
Epiſtel am achtzehenden Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis / 1. Corinth. 1.
MYļi Brahļi / Es patteitſchu mannam Deewam
allaſchien / juhſẜo dehļ / par to Deewa ſchälaſtibu /
kattra jums dohta gir eekſchan CHriſto JEſu. Ka juhß
eſẜeeta czaur to wiſẜahß Ghabbalohß baggati darriti / wiſẜa
Mahzibà / vnd wiſẜà atſiſchanà. Ka tad ta Mahziba
no CHriſto eekſchan jums ſpehziga tappuſẜi gir / tha ka
jums nhe=neekads Dawans peetruhxt / vnd ghaidaita
ween vs to Paradiſchanu muhſẜa Kunga JEſu CHriſti /
katters juhß arridſan ſtipprus paturrehß ihß Ghallam /
ka juhß nheẜohdami eſẜeeta / vs to Deenu muhſẜa Kunga
JEſu CHriſti. Aiſto Deews gir peetitziex / czaur kattru
juhß aitzenati eſẜeeta / py tahß Draudſibas ẜawa Dähla
JEſu CHriſti muhſẜa Kunga.
Evangelium am achtzehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Matth. 22.
KAd tee Pariſeeri dſirrdeya / ka JEſus teems Saduceereems
to Mutt aisbahſis by / ẜapullzeyahß
tee. Vnd weens ſtarpan teems / weens Raxtamazetais
kahrdenaya to / vnd ẜatziya: Meiſteri / kurrſch gir tas
auxtakais Baußlis eekſchan
to Baußli? Bett
JEſus ẜatziya vs to: Töw
buhß Deewu tawu Kungu
myļoht no wiſẜu Ꞩirrdi /
no wiſẜu Dwehſẜel / no wiſẜu
Prahtu. Tas gir tas
auxtakais Baußlis. Bett
tas ohtris gir tam liedſäns
Töw buhß tawu Tuwaku myļoht / ka ẜöw paſſchu.
Schinnies diweyohß Baußlies karrayahß wiß Baußlis
/ vnd tee Propeetes.
Kad nu tee Pariſeeri kohpa by / jautaya tohß JEſus
/ vnd ẜatziya: Ko ſkeetaht juhß no CHriſto? Ka
Dähls gir tas? Winyi ẜatziya / Dawida. Tas ẜatziya vs
teems: Ka ẜaudts to tad Dawids Gharrà Kungu? ẜatzidams:
Tas Kunx ẜatziya vs mannu Kungu / ẜehdees pa
mannu labbu Rohku / teekams es tawus Eenaidneekus
leeku par Pamäßlu taweems Kayeems. Ja to nu Dawids
Kungu ẜautz / ka gir tas tad winja Dähls? Vnd nhe
weens nhe ſiñaya tam kahdu Wahrdu adbildeht / vnd nhe
drieſteya arridſan no tahß Deenas tam wairs jautaht.
Epiſtel am neunzehenden Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis / Epheſ. 4.
MYļi Braļi / noleetzeeta nu no jums / pehts to preekſchu
buhſchanu to wätzu Czillwäku / katters czaur
Kahribeems eekſchan Apalloſchanas ẜöw ẜamaitayahß.
Bett atjaunayeetees eekſchan Gharru juhſẜo Prahto /
vnd apwelļzeeta to jaunu Czillwäku / katters pehts Deewu
raddiets gir eekſchan ihſtenu Taißnibu vnd Swehtibu.
Tapehts noleetzeeta tohß Mällus / vnd runnayeeta
Teeſcham / ick=kattris ar ẜawu Tuwaku / aiſto mehß muhſẜo
ſtarpa äſẜam Lohzekļi. Dußmoyeeta / vnd nhe ghräkoyeeta
/ nhe leetzeeta to Ꞩaul par juhſẜu dußmibu noreeſt.
Nhe atkapeeta tam Saimotayam. Kas ſadſis gir / tam
nhe buhß wairs ſackt / bett ſtradaht / vnd pellniet ar Rokahms
ko labb / ka tas warr doht tam Wayadſigam.
Evangelium am neunzehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Matth. 9.
JEſus kahpe Laywà /
vnd czehlehß atkal
pahr / vnd nahze ẜawà Pili.
Vnd raugi / tad neſẜe tee weenu
Mällmänaẜehrdſigu /
tas ghulleya Ghulltà. Kad
nu JESVS winjo Titzibu
redſeya / ẜatziya tas vs
to Mällmänaẜehrdſigu /
turrais labbu Prahtu / mans Dähls / tawi Ghräki gir
töw peedohti. Vnd raugi czitti ſtarpan teems Raxtamazetayeems
runnaya ẜawà ſtarpà: Schiß ſaimo Deewu.
Bett kad JEſus winjo Dohmas redſeya / ẜatziya tas /
kapehts domayeeta juhß tick ļaun juhſẜahß Ꞩirrdyhß?
Kas gir lähtake ẜatziet: Töw gir tawi Ghräki peedohti
/ jeb ẜatziet: Czelees / vnd ſtaiga? Bett ka juhß ſinnaht
/ ka ta Czillwäka dählam Warra gir wirſẜon Semmes
tohß Ghräkus peedoht / Satziya tas vs to Mällmänaẜehrdſigu.
Czellees aukſcham / jemm tawu
Ghulltu / vnd ey Mahyahß. Vnd tas czehlehß aukſcham
vnd ghaya Mahyahß. Kad tee Ļaudis to redſeya /
brynoyahß tee / vnd teitze Deewu / katters tahdu Spähku
teems Czillwäkeems dewis gir.
Epiſtel am zwantzigſten Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis / Epheſ.5.
MYļi Brahļi / peelukoyeeta nu / ka juhß apdohmige
ſtaigayeeta / nhe ka tee Nheghuddri / bett ka tee
Ghuddri vnd ẜattaiſẜeetees laikà / aiſto nhelabbs laix.
Tapehts nhe tohpeeta nheẜaprohtigi / bett prohtaita / kas
tha Kunga Prahts gir. Vnd nhe peeriyetees no Wynu /
no Kurrenes nickna dſiewoſchana attlätz. Bett tohpeeta
pilli Gharru / vnd runnayeeta juhſẜo ſtarpa no dſeeßmeems
/ vnd Patteitzibas dſeeßmeems / vnd gharrigheems
dſeeßmeems / dſeedayeeta vnd meesloyeeta tam
Kungam juhſẜahß Ꞩirrdihß / vnd pateitzeeta allaſchien
par wiſẜu leetu / Deewam vnd tam Tähwam eekſchan to
Wahrdu muhſẜa Kunga JEſu CHriſti / vnd eſẜeeta juhſẜo
ſtarpa paklauſẜgi / eekſchan Deewa biyaſchanas.
Evangelium am zwantzigſten Sontage nach
nach Trinitatis / Matth. 22.
JEſus runnaya atkal czaur Liedſibu vs teems Auxta
Baſnizaskungeems / vnd ẜatziya: Ta Debbeſẜes=wallſtiba
gir liedſa weenam Koninjam / katters ẜawam
Dählam Kahſas darriya. Vnd iſẜuhtiya ẜawus
Kallpus / tohß Weeſẜis Kahſahß aitzenaht. Vnd tee nhe
ghribbeya nahkt. Atkal iſẜuhtiya wings czittus Kallpus /
vnd ẜatziya / ẜackaita teems Weeſẜeems / Raugaita / mans
Ähdenagahdts gir ẜattaiſẜiets / manni Wehrſchi / vnd
manni Baryomalohpi gir nokauti / vnd wiſẜas leetas
ẜattaiſẜitas / nahzeeta Kahſahß. Bett tee nitzinaya to / vnd
nogaya / czitts vs ẜawu Tyrumu / czitts py ẜawu Darrbu.
Bett czitti ẜaghrabe winja Kallpus / ſaimoya / vnd nokawa
tohß. Kad to tas Konings dſirrdeya / tappa tas dußmiex
/ vnd iſẜutiya ẜawu Spähku / vnd licka ſchohß Släppkawus
nokaut / vnd eedädſenaya winjo Pili.
Tad ẜatziya wings vs ẜaweems
Kallpeems: Tahß
Kähſas gir ghattaw ẜattaiſẜitas
/ bett tee Weeſẜis
nhe by czeenigi. Tapehts
eita vs teems Eeleems / vnd
aitzenayeeta Kahſahß / kurrohß
juhß attrohdaht. Vnd
tee Kallpi ißghaya vs
teems Eeleems / vnd ẜackraya / kahdus attrasdami / ļaunus
vnd labbus / vnd tee Ghalldi kļua wiſẜi pilli. Tad
eeghaya tas Konings / tohß Weeſẜis apraudſiet / vnd eelukoya
weenu Czillwäku / tam nhe by Kahſadrehbes muggurà.
Vnd ẜatziya vs to: Draux / ka eſẜi tu ſcheitan eenahzis
/ vnd nhe eſẜe Kahſadrehbes apwillzis? Bett
wings ka Mähms pallicka. Tad ẜatziya tas Konings vs
ẜaweems Kallpeems: Ꞩeeneeta tam Rohkas vnd Kayas
/ vnd ißmetteeta to Tumſẜibà / tur buhß Kaukſchana
vnd Sohbo trieſẜeſchana. Aiſto dauds gir aitzenati / bett
mas gir ißrädſäti.
Epiſtel am ein=vnd=zwantzigſten Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Eph. 6.
PEhdige / manni Braļi / eſẜeeta ſtippri eekſchan to
Kungu / vnd eekſchan Warru ẜawà ſtipprumà. Apwellzeeta
tahß Deewa Brunņas / ka juhß warreeta prettie
ſtahweht / tai willtigai vstetzeſchanai tha Wälla. Aiſto
mums nhe gir ar Meeſẜu vnd Aſẜini ja=kauyahß / bett
ar leeleems Kungeems vnd Spehzigeems / ar wahrdu /
ar Kungeems tahß Paſẜaules / kattri ſchahß Paſẜaules
Tumſẜumà wallda / ar teems ļauneems Gharreems appakſchan
Debbes. Tapehts ẜaghrabeeta tohß Deewa
Brunņas / ka juhß / kad ta ļauna Stundinya nahk / prettie
ſtahweht / vnd wiſẜas leetas labbe ißtaiſẜiet / vnd vswahreht
warreeta.
Tad ſtahweeta nu / apyoẜuſchi juhſẜus Ghurrnus
ar Taißnibu / vnd apwilkti ar teems Kruhſchabrunņeems
tahß Taißnibas / vnd ap Kayeems apſabaghoti / ka ghattawi
mahziet to Evangelium ta Meera. Bett par wiſẜahms
leetahms / ẜaghrabeeta tohß Ällkona brunņas
tahß Titzibas / ar kattru juhß warreeta ißdſehſt wiſẜas
dedſigas bulltas ta Blehdneeka. Vnd jemmeeta to Brunņazeppur
tahß Peſtiſchanas / vnd to Sohbeni ta Gharra
/ katters gir tas Deewa Wahrdts.
Evangelium am ein=vnd=zwantzigſten Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / Joh. 4.
THa Koninja Ꞩullainis by / tha Dähls ghulleya
nhewäſẜäls Capernaumà. Schis dſirrdeya / ka JEſus
nahtze no Judea / eekſchan Galileam / vnd noghaya py
to / vnd luhdſe to / ka tas noſtaighatu / vnd palliedſähtu winja
Dählam. Aiſto tas by ihß tay Nawei nhewäſẜäls. Vnd
JEſus ẜatziya vs to: Ja
juhß Siemes vnd Brynumus
nhe rädſaht / tad juhß
nhe titzaht. Tas Koninya
Ꞩullainis ẜatziya vs winju.
Kunx / nahtz / pirms
mans Bährns mirrſt. JEſus
ẜatziya vs to: Ey proyam
/ taws Dähls dſiewo.
Tas Czillwähx titzeya tam Wahrdam / kattru JEſus
vs to ẜatziya / vnd aisghaya.
Vnd no=eyoht ẜattapa tam winja Kallpi / paſluddenaya
tham / vnd ẜatziya / Taws Bährns dſiewo. Tad
ißwaizaya tas no teems to Stundu / kad labbahk ar winju
kļuis by. Vnd tee ẜatziya / Wackar ap to ẜeptitu ſtundu
atſtahya tas Draudſis. Tad nomanņiya tas Tähws /
ap to ſtundu äſẜam / kad JESVS ẜatziya vs to / Taws
Dähls dſiewo. Vnd tas titziya ar wiſẜu ẜawu Ꞩaim.
Ta gir nu ohtra Symeh / kattru JEſus darriya / nahkdams
no Judea eekſchan Galileà.
Epiſtel am zwen=vnd=zwantzigſten Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Philipp. 1.
MYļi Braļi / Es patteitſchu mannam Deewam /
czeekahrt es juhſẜo peeminu (kattru es allaſch darru
/ wiſẜohß mannohß Patarohß par jums wiſẜeems / vnd
darru tohß Patarus ar Lyxmibu) par juhſẜu Draudſibu
py to Ewangelio / no pirrmahß Deenas ihß ſcho. Vnd
äßmu labba czerribà / ka tas / katters eekſchan jums eeẜahzis
gir to labbu darrbu / tas to arridſan pabeix / ihß
tai Deeny JEſu CHriſti / ka man tad peedärr / tha no
jums wiſẜeems czerreht / Tapehts ka es jums mannà
Ꞩirdy turru / ſchinni mannà Czeetumà / kur es to Ewangeliumu
aißbilldu / vnd apſtippru / ka juhß wiſẜi ar man
to ſchälaſtibu dabbuyuſchi eſẜeeta.
Aiſto Deews gir mans Leezeneex / ka mannai Ꞩirrdei
ſchäle gir pehts jums eekſchan JEſu CHriſto / vnd
par to luhdſcho es / ka juhſẜa myleſtiba jo Deenas jo wairahk
baggata tohp / wiſẜenadà atſiſchana vnd ẜajuſẜchanà
/ ka juhß baudyht warraht / kas labbahx gir / ka juhß
tyre vnd nhe peedauſighi eſẜeeta ihß tai Deeny CHriſti /
peepillditi ar augļeems tahß Taißnibas / kattra czaur
JEſum CHriſtum notikuſẜi gir (eekſchan jums) Deewam
par Ghodu vnd Slawu.
Evangelium am 22. Sontage nach Trini-
tatis / Matth. 18.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweems Mahzekļeems: Ta Däbbäſẜa=wallſtiba
gir liedſa weenam Koninjam / katters
ar ẜaweems Kallpeems lagadiet gribbeya. Vnd kad
tas eeẜahka lagadiet / nahze tam weens preekſchan / tas
by tam deßmitz tuhxtoſchus Pohdus parrada. Kad tas
nu nhe=ſpehya to maxaht /
pawheleya tas Kunx pardoht
ẜöw / ẜawu Ꞩeewu
vnd ẜawus Bährnus / vnd
wis kas tam by / vnd maxaht.
Tad kritta tas Kallps
ſemme / vnd peeluhdſe to /
vnd ẜatziya / Kunx / eſẜi ar
man ar Meeru / es gribbu
töw wiſẜunotaļ maxaht. Tad by tam Kungam ſchäl ta
Kallpa / vnd palaide to / vnd to Parradu atlaide tas tam
arridſan.
Tad ißghaya tas patz Kallps ara / vnd attradda
weenu no ẜaweems Beedrakallpeems / tas by tam ẜimbts
Groſchus parrada. Vnd tas ẜakampe to / vnd ſnaudſe to /
vnd ẜatziya / maxa man / ko tu man parrada eſẜi. Tad
kritta winja Beedrakallps ſemme / vnd luhdſe to / vnd
ẜatziya / Eſẜi ar man ar Meeru / es gribbu töw wiſẜunotaļ
maxaht. Bett wings nhe gribbeya / vnd noghaya / vnd
mette to Czeetumà / teekams tas maxaya / ko tas parrada
by.
Bett tad winja Beedrakallpi ſchahß leetas redſeya /
tappa tee ļohte noſkummuſchi / nahze vnd paſẜatziya ẜawam
Kungam / wiß kas by notitzis. Tad aitzenaya to
winja Kunx preekſch ẜöw / vnd ẜatziya vs to: Tu blehdyx
Kallps / wiſẜu ſcho Paradu äßmu es töw attlaidis
kad tu man luhdſi / nhe by töw tad arridſan abſchälotees /
par tawu Beedrakallpu / ka es ẜöw par töw abſchäloyohß?
Vnd winja Kunx apſkaita / vnd nodewe to teems
Mohzetayeems / teekams tas maxatu wiß ko tas tam
by parrada. Tha jums mans Däbbäſẜa Tähws arridſan
darrys / ja juhß nhe peedohſẜeeta no juhſẜeems Ꞩirrdeems
ick weens ẜawam Brahļam ẜawu Wainu. (ẜawus
Grähkus.)
Epiſtel am 23. Sontage nach Trinitatis /
Philipp. 3.
MYļi Braļi / ſtaigayeeta man pehts / vnd lukoyeeta
vs teems / kattri tha ſtaiga / ka mehß jums äſẜam
par Preekſche Siem. Aiſto dauds ſtaiga / no kattreems
es jums daſche kahrt äßmu ẜatziyis / bett nu ẜacku
es jums arridſan raudadams / tee Eenaidneeki ta Kruſta
CHriſti / kattro Galls gir ta Paſuſſchana / kattro Deews
tas Wähdärs gir / vnd kattro Ghohds kaunà tohp / tho /
kattri ſemmiſchke dohma.
Bett muhſẜa dſiewoſchana gir Debbeſẜihß / no kurrenes
mehß arridſan ghaidam to Peſtitayu JEſum CHriſtum
to Kungu. Katters muhſẜu neezigu Meeſẜu apſkaidrohß
/ ka ta liedſäna kļuhſt ẜawai apſkaidrotai Meeſẜi /
pehts to darrbu / ar kattru wings arridſan war wiſẜas
leetas ẜöw paklauſẜigus darriet.
Evange-
Evangelium am 23. Sontage nach Trini-
tatis / Matth. 22.
TAd nogaya tee Pariſeeri / vnd turreya Runnas /
(ẜarunnayahß /) ka tee JEſum ẜawà Wallodà ẜayämtu.
Vnd ẜuhtiya py to ẜawus Mahzekļus / ar Herodis
Ꞩullaiņeems / vnd ẜatziya / Meiſter / mehß ſinnam ka
tu taißnis eſẜi / vnd mahzi to Deewa Czeļļu teeſcham / vnd
tu nhe bähda pehtz nheweenu / aiſto tu nhe ohla to Vsluhkoſchanu
tho Czillwäko. Tapehtz ẜacki mums ko ſkeet tu /
girahk tas pareiſe / ka mehß tam Keiſeŗam Nohmu dohdam
/ jeb nhe? Kad nu JEſus
winjo blehdibu nomanniya
/ ẜatziya tas. Juhß
Willtineeki / ko ißklauſẜaita
juhß mann? Radaita mann
ſchurr to Nohmukauſẜu.
Vnd tee parahdiya tham
weenu Ghroſẜi. Vnd wings
ẜatziya vs teems: Ka Syhme
gir tha / vnd tas Wirſẜoraxtz? Tee ẜatziya vs winju:
Ta Keyſeŗa. Tad ẜatziya wings vs teems: Tad
dohdeeta tam Keiſeŗam / kas tam Keyſeŗam peedärr / vnd
Deewam kas Deewam peedärr. Kad tee to dſirrdeya
/ iſẜabrienoyahß tee / vnd atſtahya to / vnd ghaya
nohſt.
Epiſtel am 24. Sontage nach Trinitatis /
Coloſſ. 1.
MYļi Brahļi / Mehß nhe mittam par jums luhkt / ka
juhß peepillditi tohpat / ar Atſiſchanu Deewa
prahta / eekſchan wiſẜu gharrigu ghuddribu vnd ẜappraſſchanu
/ ka juhß ſtaighayeeta czeenige tam Kungam
pa wiſẜam prahtam. Vnd aughligi eſẜeeta eekſchan wiſẜeems
labeems darrbeems / vnd aughaita eekſchan Deewa
atſiſchanas / vnd eeſtipprenati tohpeeta ar wiſẜenadu
Warru / pehtz winja ghohdigu ſpähku / eekſchan wiſẜenadas
pazeeſchanas / vnd lehnprahtibas / ar Liexmibu / vnd
patteizibu ẜackam tam Tähwam / kas mums derrigus
darriyis gir / py tahß Bährna manntibas to ſwähto eekſchan
ghaiſchumas. Katters mums peſtiyis gir / no to
Spähku tahß Tumbſẜibas / vnd gir mums pahrſtattiyis
eekſchan tahß Wallſtibas ẜawa mieļa Dähla / py kattru
mums gir ta Peſtiſchana czaur ẜawu Aſẜini / ar wahrdu
ta Peedoſchaua to Ghräko.
Evangelium am 24. Sontage nach Trini-
tatis / Matth. 9.
KAd JEſus runnaya ar Jaņa Mahzekļeems / raugi /
tad nahze weens no teems Wirſẜeneekeems / vnd
kritta preekſchan to ſemme / vnd ẜatziya / Kunx / manna
Meitha gir taggadien nomirruſẜi / bett nahz / vnd vsleetz
ẜawu Rohku vs tahß / tad taps tha dſiewa. JEſus czehlehß
aukſcham / vnd ſtaighaya tam packaļ / vnd winja
Mahzekļi. Vnd raugi / weena Ꞩeewa / kattra diwipaddeßmitt
ghaddus Aſẜins=
ẜährgà by ghulleyuſẜi / ghaya
attpackaļļ py to / vnd
aißkahre winja Drehbes
Wiehl. Aiẜto ta ẜatziya py
ẜöw paſſchu / warrätu es
ween winja Drehbes Wiel
aißkahrt / tad taptu es Wäſẜäla.
Tad attgreſehß JEſus
apkahrt / vnd vsluhkoya to / vnd ſatziya: Turrais
labbu prahtu manna Meita / tawa Titziba gir töw palliedſeyuſẜi.
Vnd ta Ꞩeewa tappa Wäſẜäla tanny paſſchà
ſtundà.
Vnd kad wings tha Wirrſẜeneeka Nammà nahze /
vnd redſeya tohß Stabbulneekus / vnd to Trohxne to
Ļauſcho / ẜatziya wings vs teems / Attkahpeetees / aiſto
ta Meitinya nhe gir nomirruſẜi / bett ta ghull. Vnd tee
apſmehya winju. Bett kad tee Ļaudis ißdſieti by / ghaya
wings eekſcha / vnd ẜathwere to py Rohkas. Tad czehlehß
ta Meitinya aukſcham. Vnd ta ſlawa ißpauda
par to paſſchu wiſẜu Semm.
Epiſtel am 25. Sontage nach Trinitatis /
1. Theſſ. 4.
MJeļi Brahļi / Mehß nhe ghribbam jums ſlehpt /
no teems kattri aiſmigguſchi gir / ka juhß nhe eſẜeeta
noſkummuſchi / ka czitti / kattreems czerriba nhe gir.
Aiſto ja mehß titzam / ka JEſus nomirris / vnd attkal aukſcham
czehlees gir / ihten ta arridſan Deews / tohß / kattri
aismigguſchi gir / czaur JEſum / ar to weddies.
Aiſto to ẜackam mehß jums / ka weenu wahrdu tha
Kunga / ka mehß / kattri mehß dſiewoyam / vnd attleekam
/ kad tas Kunx attnahx / teems nhe nahxim preekſchan
/ kattri aiſmigguſchi gir / aiſto tas Kunx patz ar
weenu Kleekſchanu vnd Ballxni tha ihſtäna Eņgeļa /
vnd ar to Deewa Baſuni ſcheit ſemmeh nahx no Däbbäſẜu.
Vnd tee Mirroņi eekſchan CHriſto / pirrmahk attkal
aukſcham czelſẜees / tad pehtz / kattri mehß dſiewoyam /
vnd attleekam / tapſẜim lieds ar teems paſſcheems norauti
eekſchan teems Paddebbeſẜeems / tam Kungam prettie
ghaiſẜà / vnd ta buhſẜim mehß py to Kungu allaſchien. Ta
eeliexmoyeetees ẜöw nu ar ſcheems Wahrdeems ẜawà
ſtarrpà.
Evangelium am 25. Sontage nach Trini-
tatis / Matth. 24.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweems Mahzekļeems: Kad juhß
nu redſeſẜeeta to nheghanntibu tahß ißpohſtiſchanas
/ no kattru ẜatzietz gir czaur to Proweetu Daniel / ka
tas ſtahw eekſchan to ſwähtu weetu / kas to laſẜa / tam
buhß to labb abdohmaht. Tad laid bähg wirſẜon teems
Kallneems / kas Juddo=Semmeh gir / vnd kas wirs
Jumbtu gir / tas laid nhe kahp ſemmeh / kolabb no ẜawu
Nammu attneſteeß. Vnd kas wirrs Lauku gir / tas laid
nhe attghreeſchahß ẜawas Drehbes attneßtees. Bett
way teems apgruhtenateems / vnd Sieſchameems tanny
laikà. Bett luhdſeeta ka juhſẜa behkſchana nhe lätzahß
Seemà jeb Swehdeenà / aiſto tad tahdas leelas bähdas
buhß / ka nhe gir biyis no Eeẜakumu tahß Paſẜaules / ihß
ſchim / vnd ka arridſan wairs nhe buhß. Vnd ja ſchahß
Deenas nhe taptu pa=ihſẜenatas / tad nhe taptu nhe
weens Czillwähx ſwähtz.
Bett to Jßrädſäto dehļ tohp
tahß Deenas pa=iſẜenatas.
Ja tad kaßlabban vs
jums ẜatzies / Redſeeta / ſcheit
gir CHriſtus / jeb tur / tad
nhe buhß jums to titzeht /
aiſto nhe vstitzami CHriſti
/ vnd nhe=vstitzami Proweetes
ißdohſẜees / vnd leelas Siemes vnd brienumus
darries / ka arridſan tee ißrädſäti (ja tas tha warrätu
buht) leelà peewillſchanà peewillti taptu. Redſeeta / es
äßmu jums to papreekſch ẜatziyis. Tapehtz / kad tee vs
jums ẜatzies / redſeeta / tas gir Tuxneſẜy / tad nhe eita
aran / redſeeta / tas gir Kambary / tad nhe titzaht. Aiſto
ihten ka tas Sibbänns ißlätz no Rieta puſẜes / vnd attſpied
ihß Wackara puſẜes / ta buhß arridſan ta Attnahkſchana
tha Czillwäka Dähla. Aiſto kurr Maita gir /
turr ẜackrahyahß tee Ehrgļi.
Epiſtel am 26. Sontage nach Trinitatis /
2. Petr. 3.
MJeļi Brahļi / ſinnaita to papreekſch / ka eekſchan
pehdigahms Deenahms nahx Smehyehyi / kattru
pehtz ẜawu paſſchu Prahtu dſiewohß / vnd ẜatzies /
Kur gir ta ẜohliſchana winja (Deewa) atnahkſchanas?
Aiſto pehtz to ka tee Tähwi aismigguſchi gir / palleek wiſẜas
leetas / ta ka tahß no Eeẜakumu tahß Raddibas bijuſchas
gir. Bett nhe ghribbädammi nhe ghribb tee ſinnaht
/ ka ta Debbes pirrmayohß laikohß arridſan by / ta
lieds arridſan ta Semme / no Vdeni vnd eekſchan Vdeni
biyuſẜi czaur Deewa Wahrdu / vnd tomähr tappa tanny
laikà ta Paſẜaule czaur teem paſſcheem ar to Vdens ghräku
(czaur to Wardu vnd Vdeni.) ẜamaitata. Ta arridſan ta
Debbes / kattra taggad gir / vnd ta Semme / tohp czaur
winja Wahrdu ẜaudẜäta / ka tee tam Vggunim paſẜarghati
tohp / py to Deenu tahß Ꞩohdibas / vnd py paſudenaſchanas
to beßdeewigo Czillwäko. Bett weenai leetai
nhe buhß jums paſlähptai buht / juhß mieligi / ka weena
Deena preekſchan to Kungu gir ka tuhxtoſchi ghaddi /
vnd tuhxtoſchi ghaddi ka weena Deena. Tas Kunx nhe
kawe to Ꞩohliſchana / ka daſchi to weenu kaweſchanu
ſkeet / bett tas gir lehniex ar mums / vnd nhe ghribb / ka
kamlabban buhß paſuſtam tapt / bett ka ick=kattris no
Ghräkeems attſtahyahß.
Bett ta Deena ta Kunga nahx / ka kahtz Sagglis
nackty / eekſchan kattru tahß Debbeſẜes ißniex / ar leelu
brackſchkeſchanu / bett tee Eẜakumi no karrſtumu ißkuſẜies /
vnd ta Semme / vnd tee Darrbi / kattri tur eekſchan gir /
taps ẜadädſenati.
Kad nu tam ta wiſẜam buhß ißniekt / ka buhß jums
tad ẜattaiſẜitees? Ar ẜwätu dſiewoſchanu vnd buhſchanu
kattra Deewam patiek / ka juhß ghaidaht vnd ſteidſatees
vs to nahkoſchu Deenu ta Kunga / kad tahß Debbeſẜes ar
Vgguni ißniex / vnd tee Eeẜakumi no karrſtumu ißkuſẜies.
Bett mehß ẜaghaidam weenu jaunu Debbes / vnd weenu
jaunu Semm / ka wings ẜohliyis gir / eekſchan kattras
Taißniba dſiewo.
Evangelium am 26. Sontage nach Trini-
tatis / Matth.25.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweems
mahzekļeems:
Kad ta Czillwäka Dähls
nahx eekſchan ẜawas Ghodibas
/ vnd wiſẜi Engeļi ar
to / tad tas ẜehdehß vs to
Krähßlu ẜawas Ghodibas /
vnd wiſẜi Ļaudis taps
preekſchan to ẜakrahti / vnd
wings tohß noſkirrß ihten ka kahtz Ghanns tahß Ahwis
no teems Ahſcheems noſkirŗ / vnd tahß Ahwis taps pa
winja labbas Rohkas licktas / bett tee Ahſchi pa kreiſẜas
Rohkas. Tad tas Konings ẜatzies vs teems pa ẜawas
labbas Rohkas: Nahzeeta ſchurr / juhß ſwehtiti manna
Tähwa / eemanntoyeeta to Wallſtibu / kattra jums ẜattaiſẜita
gir no Eeẜakumu tahß Paſẜaules. Aiſto es äßmu
ißaltzis biyis / vnd juhß eſẜeeta mann pee=ähdenayuſchi
/ es äßmu ißtwiezis biyis / vnd juhß eſẜeeta mann dſirrdinayuſchi
/ es äßmu Weeſẜis biyis / vnd juhß eſẜeeta mann
mayoyuſchi / es äßmu plix biyis / vnd juhß eſẜeeta mann
aptährpuſchi / es äßmu Nhewäſẜäls vnd czeetumà biyis /
vnd juhß eſẜeeta py mann nahkuſchi.
Tad tam tee Taißni adbilldehß / vnd ẜatzies / Kunx /
kad äſẜam mehß töw ißallkuſchu redſeyuſchi / vnd äſẜam
töw pee=ähdenayuſchi? Jeb ißtwiekuſchu / vnd äſẜam
töw dſirrdinayuſchi? Kad äſẜam mehß töw parr Weeſẜi
redſeyuſchi / vnd mahyoyuſchi? Jeb plicku / vnd äſẜam
töw aptährpuſchi? Kad äſẜam mehß töw nhewäſẜälu jeb
Czeetumà redſeyuſchi / vnd äſẜam py töw nahkuſchi? Vnd
tas Konings adbilldehß / vnd vs teems ẜatzies / Pattees /
es ẜacku jums / ko juhß eſẜeeta darriyuſchi weenam no
ſcheems manneems wißmaſakayeems Brahļeems / to
eſẜeeta juhß mann darriyuſchi.
Tad wings arridſan ẜatzies vs teems / pa kreiſẜas
Rohkas: Eita nohſt no mann juhß nolahdäti eekſchan to
muhſchigu Vgguni / katters tur ẜataiſẜietz gir tam Wällam
/ vnd ẜaweems Engeļeems. Es äßmu ißallzis biyis /
vnd juhß nhe eſẜeeta mann peeähdenayuſchi / es äßmu
ißtwiezis biyis / vnd juhß nhe eſẜeeta mann dſirrdinayuſchi
/ es äßmu Weeſẜis biyis / vnd juhß nhe eſẜeeta mann
mahyoyuſchi / es äßmu plix biyis / vnd juhs nhe eſẜeeta
mann aptährpuſchi / Es äßmu Nhewäſẜäls vnd Czeetumà
biyis / vnd juhs nhe eſẜeeta mann apraudſiyuſchi.
Tad tee arridſan adbilldehs / vnd ẜatzies / Kunx / kad
äſẜam mehs töw redſeyuſchi ißallkuſchu / jeb ißtwiekuſchu /
jeb Weeſẜi / jeb plicku / jeb Nhewäſẜälu / jeb Czeetumà /
vnd nhe äſẜam töw Kallpoyuſchi? Tad wings adbilldehß
vnd ẜatzies / Pattees es ẜacku jums / ko juhß nhe eſẜeeta
darriyuſchi / weenam no ſcheems wißmaſakayeems /
to nhe eſẜeeta juhß mann arridſan darriyuſchi. Vnd tee
ees eekſchan tahß muhſchigas mohzibas / bett tee Taißni
eekſchan tahß muhſchigas dſiewoſchanas.
Epiſtel am 27. Sontage nach Trinitatis /
2. Petr. 1.
MYļi Brahļi / es nhe ghribbu miſt / jums allaſchien
attminneht / ka juhß to ſinnaht / vnd eeſtipprenahti
eſẜeeta eekſchan tahs preekſchabuhdamas taißnibas. Aiſto
es ſkeetohs pareiſe darram / tick illge ka es ſchinny buhdà
äßmu / juhs vsmodenaht / vnd peemineht. Aiſto es ſinnu /
ka es ẜawu buhdu dries attſtahſchu / ka mann to arridſan
muſẜo Kunx JEſus Chriſtus gir ſinnamu darriyis. Bett
es ghribbu ta ſtrahdaht / ka juhs wiſẜur to warreeta kad
es buhſſchu no jums attſtahyis / peeminnädami patturreht.
Aiſto mehß nhe äſẜam klauſẜiyuſchi tohß Ghuddrus
Paſẜackus / kad mehß jums lickam ſinnaht to Spähku
vnd
vnd to Attnahkſchanu muhſẜa Kunga JEſu CHriſti /
bett mehß äſẜam winja Ghohdibu paſſchi redſeyuſchi / kad
wings dabbuya no Deewu to Tähwu / Ghohdu vnd
Slawu / czaur weenu ballxni / kattra winjam / noticka /
no tahß leelas Ghohdibas / ar wahrdu: Schiß gir manns
mieļais Dähls / py kattru mann labbs Prahtz gir. Vnd
ſcho Ballxni äſẜam mehß dſirrdeyuſchi no Däbbäſẜu attnäſtu
/ kad mehß ar to biyam / wirs to ẜwähtu Kallnu.
Evangelium am 27. Sontage nach Trini-
tatis Matth. 17.
PEhtz ẜeſſchams Deenahms jehme JEſus py ẜöw
Peteri vnd Jäcobu / vnd Jahni winja Brahli / vnd
wedde tohß ẜawißke vs weenu auxtu Kallnu / vnd tappa
winjeems rädſoht apſkaidrohtz. Vnd winja Waix ſpiedeya
ka ta Ꞩaule / vnd winja Drehbes tappa balltas / ka
ta Ghaißma. Vnd redſi / tad paradiyahß teems Moſes
vnd Elias / tee runnaya ar winju. Bett Peteris adbilldeya
vnd ẜatziya vs JEſu /
Kunx ſcheit gir labba buhſchana
/ ghribbi tu / tad
ghribbam mehß ſcheit tries
Buhdas darriet / weenu
preekſch töw / Moſi ohtru /
vnd Elia treſſchu. Kad tas
wehl ta runnaya / redſi /
tad pahrſpiedehya tohß
weena ſpohſcha Padebbes / vnd reds / weena Ballxne no
tahß Padebbes ẜatziya / Schis gir manns myļais Dähls /
py kattru mann labbs Prahtz gir / to buhß jums klauſẜiet.
Kad to tee Mahzekļi dſirrdeya / kritta tee vs ẜawu Waigu
/ vnd iſẜabiyayahß ļohte. Bett JEſus ghaya py teems /
aiſkahre tohß / vnd ẜatziya / czelleetees aukſcham / vnd nhe
iſẜabieſtatees.
Bett kad tee ẜawas Atzis pazehle / nhe redſeya tee
nhe weenu / ka JEſum ween. Vnd kad tee no to Kallnu
ſemmeh ghaya / aißleedſe teems JEſus / vnd ſatziya / jums
nhe buhß to ko juhß eſẜeeta redſeyuſchi / nheweenam ẜatziet /
teekams ka ta Czillwäka Dähls no teems Mirroņeems
atkal aukſcham czehlees gir.
Folgen etliche Lettiſche
Epiſteln vnd Evangelia auff die fürnehmſte
Feſte im Jahr.
Epiſtel am Tage S. Andreae /
Rom. 10.
MJeļi Brahļi / ja kaßlabb no Ꞩirdtz titz / tas
tohp taißnohtz / vnd ja kaßlabb ar Mutt ißẜacka
/ tas tohp ſwähtz. Aiſto tas Raxtz ẜacka /
kas vs to titz / tas nhe taps kaunà. Scheitan nhe gir ẜawahtz
Juddis / ẜawahtz Ghreekis / To wiſẜo gir weens
Kunx / bagghahtz par wiſẜeems kattri to peeẜautz. Aiſto
kas to Wahrdu tha Kunga peeẜaux / tam buhß ſwähtam
tapt. Bett ka buhß teems peeẜaukt / vs ko tee nhe titz?
Bett ka buhß teems titzeht / no kattru tee nhe gir nheneeka
dſirrdeyuſchi? Bett ka buhß teems dſirrdeht / bes
Mahzetayeems? Bett ka buhß teems mahziet / ja tee
nhe tohp ẜuhtiti? Ka tad raxtietz ſtahw / ka jaukas
Kahyas gir teems kattri to Meeru paſluddena / kattri to
labbumu paſluddena. Bett tee nhe gir wiſẜi tam Ewangelio
paklauſẜigi / Aiſto Eſaias ẜacka: Kunx kas titz
muhſẜai Mahzibai? Tad nahk ta Titziba no to Mahzibu
/ bett ta Mahziba no to Deewa Wahrdu. Bett es
ẜacku: Negg gir tee to dſirrdeyuſchi? Pattees czaur
wiſẜu ſemm gir winja ballxnis ißghayis / vnd wiſẜà Paſẜauleh
winjo Wahrtz.
Evangelium am Tage S. Andreae
Matth. 4.
JEſus ſtaighadams py to Galileeŗo Juhri / eeraudſiya
diwi Brahļus / Simoni / katters noẜauktz gir
Peteris / vnd Andres ẜawu Brahļi / tee eemette ẜawu Tieklu
Juhry / aiſto tee by Sweineeki. Vnd wings ẜatziya vs
teems: Nahzeeta packaļ mann / es ghribbu jums par
Czillwäko Sweineekus darriet. Dries attſtahya tee ẜawus
Tieklus / vnd ghaya packaļ winju. Vnd no tennenes
tahļahk eedams / eeraudſiya
wings czittus diwi
Brahļus / Jäcobu / to Dählu
Zebedei / vnd Jahni ẜawu
Brahli / Laiwà ar ẜawu
Tähwu Zebedeo / ẜawus
Tieklus lahpoht. Vnd
wings ẜautze tohß: Tudeļļ
attſtahya tee to Laiwu vnd
ẜawu Tähwu / vud ghaya packaļļ winju.
Epiſtel am Tage S. Tohmae /
Epheſ. 1.
SLahwähtz gir Deews vnd tas Tähws muhſẜa
Kunga JEſu CHriſti / katters mums ſwehtiyis
gir ar daſchadu gharrigu ſwehtibu / eekſchan Debbeſkigeems
Dahwaneems czaur Chriſtum / ka wings mums
arridſan ißwehleyis gir czaur to paſſchu / pirms tai Paſẜaulei
tas dibbins licktz tappa / ka mums by ſwähteems
buht vnd nhe peemettigheems preekſcha winju eekſchan
tahß miläſtibas. Vnd gir mums vsjehmis par Behrneems
ẜöw paſſcham / czaur JEſum CHriſtum / ka winya
Prahtam pattitzis gir / par Ghohdu ẜawai krahßnai
ſchäläſtibai / czaur kattru wings mums peejemmigus
darriyis gir / eekſchan to mieligu.
Evangelium am Tage S. Thomae /
Joh. 20.
vide Dnic. Quaſimodogeniti
Epiſtel am Tage Pauli Bekehrung /
Act. 9. Cap.
SAulus ẜchņahze wehl draudedams vnd kaudams /
prettie teems Mahzekļeems ta Kunga. Vnd ghaya
py Auxtubaſnizaskungu / vnd luhdſe tam Ghramatas
vs Damaſco py teems Skohlneekeems / ja tas kahdus
vs to paſſchu czeļļu attraſtu / Wierus vnd Ꞩeewas /
wings tohß ẜaſẜeetus wäßtu vs Jeruſalemes. Vnd kad
wings vs czeļļu by / vnd tuwe py Damaſco nahze / apſpiedeya
winju peepehſch weena Ghaißma no Däbbäſẜu /
vnd kritta py Semmes / vnd dſirrdeya weenu ballxni / ta
ẜatziya vs winju / Saul / Saul / ko tu mann prettie ſtahwi?
Bett wings ẜatziya: Kunx / kas eſẜi tu? Tas Kunx
ẜatziya / Es äßmo JEſus / kattram tu prettie ſtahw. Töw
ghruht nahxees prettie Skähpu ſpahrdiet. Vnd wings ẜatziya
trieſẜädams vnd biedams / Kunx / ko ghribbi tu / ko
mann buhß darriet? Tas Kunx ẜatziya vs winju: Czellees
aukſcham / vnd ee=ey Pily / Teitan töw ẜatzies / ko töw
buhß darriet.
Bett tee Wieri / kattri winja Czeļļaļaudis by / ſtahweya
vnd by pahrbiyuſchees / aiſto tee dſirrdeya weenu
ballxni / vnd nhe redſeya nhe weenu. Bett Saulus czehlehß
aukſcham no Semmes / vnd pazälldams ẜawas
Atzis / nhe redſeya wings nhe weenu. Bett tee jehme
winju py Rohkas / vnd wedde to vs Damaſco / vnd nhe
warreya trieyahß Deenahs redſeht / ney ähßdams / ney
dſärrdams.
Bett weens Mahzeklis by eekſchan Damaſco / ar
wahrdu Ananias / vs to ẜatziya tas Kunx czaur ghiemi:
Anania / vnd wings ẜatziya / Scheitan äßmo es Kunx.
Tas Kunx ẜatziya vs winju / czellees aukſcham / vnd ey
eekſchan to Eelu / kattru ẜautz to Taißnu / vnd waiza eekſchan
to Nammu Juda pehtz Saulu / ar Wahrdu no
Tarſen / aiſto jemm währa / wings ſkaita Patarus / vnd
gir redſeyis Ghiemy weenu Wieru / ar wahrdu AnaniasAnaniAnainas
/ py ẜöw nahkam / vnd to Rohku vs winju leekam / ka
wings attkall redſiex tohp.
Bett Ananias adbilldeya / Kunx / es äßmu no daudſeems
dſirrdeyis no ſcho Wieru / ka tas dauds nhelaimes
taweems ſwähteems darriyis gir Jeruſalehmeh / vnd
tam gir ſcheitan waļļa no teems Auxteems Baſnizas=
kungheems / ẜaiſtiet wiſẜus kattri tawu Wahrdu peeẜautz.
Tas Kunx ẜatziya vs winju: Ey prohyam / Aiſto ſchis
gir mann weens ißrädſähtz ammatariex / ka tas mannu
Wahrdu näs preekſchan teems Paggaņeems / vnd preekſchan
teems Koninyeems / vnd preekſchan teems Bährneems
no Jſrael / Es ghrihbu tam radiet / ka dauds tam
manna Wahrda dehļ czeeſt buhß. Vnd Ananias noghaya
vnd nahze tanny Nammà / vnd licka tahß Rohkas vs
winju / vnd ẜatziya: Mieļais Brahli Saul / tas Kunx
gir mann ẜuhtiyis / kas töw parahdiyees gir vs czeļļu
ſchurp nahkoht / ka tu attkal redſiex / vnd ar to ſwähtu
Gharru pepilldietz tohpi. Vnd tudeļļ nokritta tas no winja
Atzihms ka ſwieņi / vnd tappa attkal redſiex. Vnd
czehlehß aukſcham / lickahß ẜöw Chriſtitees vnd jehme
Barribu py ẜöw / vnd attſpirrghahß.
Bett Saulus by daſchu Deenu py teems Mahzekļeems
eekſchan Damaſco / vnd tudeļļ mahziya wings no
CHriſto eekſchan Skohlahms / ka tas patz äſẜohtz Deewa
Dähls. Bett tee wiſẜi iſẜabiyayahß / kattri to dſirrdeya
vnd ẜatziya. Negg gir tas kas eekſchan Jeruſalem ißpohſtiya
wiſẜus / kattri ſcho Wahrdu peeẜautze / vnd tapehtz
attnahzis / ka tas tohß ẜaẜaiſtitus wäſtu py teems auxteems
Baſnizaskungeems? Bett Paulus tappa jo wairahk
ſtiprahx / vnd eerunnaya tohß Juddus / kattri eekſchan
Damaſco dſiewoya / vnd apleezenaya / ka ſchiß gir
tas Chriſtus.
Evangelium am Tage Pauli Bekehrung /
Matth.19.
PEteris ẜatziya vs JEſu / Redſi / mehß äſẜam wißnotaļļ
attſtahyuſchi / vnd äſẜam ar töw ghayuſchi / kas
attlätz mums no to? Bett JEſus ẜatziya vs teems: Pattees
es ẜacku jums / ka juhß / kattri juhß eſẜeeta ar mann
ghayuſchi / eekſchan tahß Attdſimbſchanas / kad tha Czillwäka
Dähls ẜehdehß vs to Krähßlu ẜawas Ghodibas /
juhß arridſan ẜehdehſẜeeta vs diwipaddeßmitt Krähßleems
/ vnd teeſẜahſẜeeta tohß diwipaddeßmitt Czilltus

Malach. 3.
RAughi / es ghribbu ẜawu Engeli ẜuhtiet / kattram

Am Tage der Verkündigung Mariae
Eſa. 7.
TAs Kunx runnaya vs Ahas / vnd ẜatziya: Praſẜais
weenu Siem no to Kungu tawu Deewu / jeb

Evangelium am Tage der Verkündigung
Mariae / Luc. 1. Cap.
SÄßtà Mehneſẜi tapa tas Engels Gabriels ẜuhtietz

ir Nazareth / py weenas Jumprawas / kattra ẜadärräta

Dawida / vnd ta Jumprawa dehwehya Maria. Vnd

puta,
no Deewu.) ſchälaſtibas / tas Kunx
gir ar töw / tu auxteteitzama no Ꞩeewahms. Bett winja

vnd domaya / kahda ſweizenaſchana gir ta? Vnd tas
Engels ẜatziya vs tahß / nhe byeſtees Maria / tu eſẜi ſchälaſtibu

Wahrdu buhß töw JEſus dehweht / tas buhß leels / vnd

Jacob muhſchige / vnd tha Koninja=Wallſtiba nhe mittehſẜees.
Tad ẜatziya Maria vs to Engeli / ka buhß tam notickt?

Dählu wätza buhdama / vnd eet nu ẜäſtà Mehneſẜy / kattrai

Deews warr wiſẜas leetas darriet. Bett Maria ẜatziya:
Redſi / es äßmu tha Kunga Kallpone / mann noteek / ka tu
ẜatziyis eſẜi. Vnd tas Engelis ſkierehß no tahß.

JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweems
mahzekļeems:
Juhſẜai Ꞩirrdei nhe buhß

Ꞩacka vs to Thomas / Kunx / mehß nhe ſinnam /

Letti
Lipſts) Kunx / rahdi mums
to Tähwu / tad gir mums ghann. JEſus ẜacka vs to:
Tick illge äßmu es py jums / vnd tu mann nhe paſieſti.
Wilip ( Lipſti /) kas mann räds / tas räds to Tähwu / ka
ẜacki tu tad / Rahdi mums to Tähwu? Nhe titzi tu / ka es
eekſchan to Tähwu / vnd tas Tähws eekſchan mann gir?
Tohß Wahrdus kattrus es vs jums runnayo / tohß nhe

ſchan mann gir / ja nhe / tad titzaht jehle man to Darrbo
dehļ. Pattees / Pattees / es ẜacko jums / kas vs mann

ro / vnd leelakus nhe ka ſchohß darries / aiſto es eemo py

du / to ghribbo es darriet / katas Tähws Ghohdahtz

Turr gir weens ballxnis weena Mahzetaya Tuxneſẜy

fers / Luc. 1.
ELiſabethes laix nahze / ka tay dſimbt by / vnd ta dſimma

Raddi dſirrdeya / ka tas Kunx leelu ſchäläſtibu py winjas

/ vnd dehweya to
ẜawa Tähwa wahrdà Zacharias.

Nhe / bett tham buhß Jaņam
no ẜaucktam buht.

Nhe weens nhe gir tawà Raddà / kam tahtz Wahrtz

propriè

) ẜawam
Tähwam / ka wings to ghribbätu dehweht lickt. Vnd

/ vnd runnaya Deewu ſlawädams. Vnd weena
Jßbaile nahze par wiſẜeems Kaimiņņeems. Vnd wiſẜa
ſchy leeta tappa ſinnama par wiſẜu to Juddo Kallnu.
Vnd wiſẜi kattri to dſirrdeya / jehmehß py Ꞩirrdtz / vnd

Vnd winja Tähws Zacharias tappa pills no to
ſwähtu Gharru / mahziya / ẜatzidams:
Slawähtz gir tas Kunx / tas Deews Jſraël / aiſto

Vnd gir mums pazehlis weenu Raggu tahß Peſtiſchanas
/ eekſchan to Nammu ẜawa Kallpa Dawid.
Ka tas pirrmayohß laikohß runnayis gir czaur to
Mutt ẜawo ſwähto Proweeto.
Ka tas mums peſtitu no muhſẜeems Eenaideneekeems
/ vnd no to Rohku wiſẜo tho / kattri mums eenied.
Vnd to ſchäläſtibu paradietu muhſẜeems Tähweems /
vnd attghada tohß ẜawas ſwähtas ẜaliedſenaſchanas.
Vnd tahß Swehreſchanas / kattru tas ſwehreyis gir
muhſẜam Tähwam Abrahamam / mums doht.
Ka mehß peſtiti tohpam / no to Rohku muhſẜo Waideneeko
/ vnd tam Kallpoyam bes bieſchanas tick illge ka
mehß dſiewoyam.
Eekſchan ſwehtibas vnd Taißnibas / kattra tam pattiek.
Vnd tu Behrnings tapſi weens Proweetz tha Wiſẜa=
auxtaka dähwähtz / tu eeſi preekſchan to Kungu / ka tu
tam to czeļļu ẜataiſẜi.
Vnd Adſiſchanu tahß Peſtiſchanas dohd ẜaweems Ļaudeems
/ kattra gir eekſchan winjo Ghräko Peedoſchanu.
Czaur to Ꞩirdtzdibbenigu ſchäläſtibu muhſẜa Deewa
/ czaur kattru mums peemeckleyis gir tas Auſtrums
no tahß Auxtibas.
Ka tas atſpiedätu teems / kattri ẜehſch Tumbſẜumà /
vnd nahwes ähnà / vnd ißtaiſẜitu muhſẜas Kahyas vs
to czeļļu tha Meera.
Vnd tas Behrnings augha / vnd tappa ſtippris eekſchan
Gharru / vnd by Tuxneſẜy / teekams ka tam by preekſcha
nahkt / preekſchan teems Ļaudeems Jſraël.
Epiſtel am Tage S. Petri vnd S. Pauli /
Act. 12.
KAs Konings Herodes peelicka tahß Rohkas py
czitteems no tahß draudzes tohß mohziet. Bett
wings nomaitaya to Jaņa Brahli ar Sobeni. Vnd
kad wings redſeya / ka tas teems Juddeems patticka /
ẜayehme tas irr Peteri. Bett tanny paſſchà laikà by
tahß Deenas tahß Ꞩalldahß=maiſes. Kad wings to
nu ẜayehme / licka wings to Czeetumà / vnd nodewe to

/ vnd ſkittahß to pehtz Leeldeen teems Ļaudeems
preekſcha weſt. Vnd teeſẜa / Peteris tappa Czeetumà
turrähtz / bett ta Draudſe luhdſe par to Deewu beß mitteſchanas.
Vnd kad Herodes to ghribbeya preekſcha weſt /
tanny paſſcha nackty ghulleya Peteris ſtarrpa diweems
Kaŗŗawiereems / ẜaſẜeetz ar diweems Kehdehms / vnd tee
Ꞩarrghi preekſchan Durrweems ẜarrghaya to Czeetumu.
Vnd reds / tas Engels ta Kungha attghaya / vnd
weena ghaißma ſpiedeya eekſchan to ähku / vnd ẜitta Peteri
Ꞩahnohß / vnd vsmohdenaya to / vnd ẜatziya / czellees
tickuſẜche aukſcham / vnd tahß Kehdes kritta tam no
winja Rohkahms. Vnd tas Engels ẜatziya vs to / apyohſẜees
/ vnd apwellzees ẜawas Kurrpes. Vnd tas darriya
tha. Vnd wings ẜatziya vs to: Apmettees ẜawu Mehteli
apkahrt ẜöw / vnd nahtz ar mann. Vnd tas ißghaya /
vnd ghaya winyam packaļļ / vnd nhe ſinnaya / ka tas
tam itt teeſcham noticktu czaur to Engeli / hett tas ſkitta
weenu ghiemi rädſohtz.
Bett tee ghaya czaur to pirrmu vnd ohtru Wackti /
vnd nahze py teems dſällſa Durrweems / kattras vs Jällghawu
eet / tahß no ẜöw paſſcheems attdarriyahß. Vnd
ißghaya / vnd ghaya weenu Eelas ghaŗŗumu / vnd tudeļļ
ſkierehß tas Engels no to. Vnd kad Peteris attghahdayahß
/ ẜatziya tas / Nu ſinnu es teeſcham / ka tas Kunx
ẜawu Engeli ẜuhtiyis gir / vnd mann ißpeſtiyis no to Rohku
Herodis / vnd no wiſẜu ẜarrghaſchanu to Juddo Ļauſcho.
Evangelium am Tage S. Petri vnd S. Pau-
li / Matth. 16.
JEſus nahze eekſchan
teems Eſcheems tahß
Pilis Ceſarea Wilippi / vnd
waizaya ẜawus Mahzekļus
vnd ẜatziya / ko ẜacka tee
Ļaudis / kas ta Czillwäka
Dähls äſẜohtz? Tee ẜatziya:
Czitti ẜacka / Tu äſẜohtz
Janis tas Chriſtetais:
Czitti / tu äſẜohtz Elias / czitti / tu äſẜohtz Jeremias / jeb
weens no teems Proweeteems. Wings ẜatziya vs teems:
Ko ẜackaht tad juhß / kas es äſẜohtz? Tad adbilldeya Simon
Peteris / vnd ẜatziya / Tu eſẜi Chriſtus / ta dſiewa
Deewa Dähls.
Vnd JEſus adbilldeya vnd ẜatziya vs to: Swähtz
eſẜi tu Simon Jonaſa Dähls / aiſto Meeſẜas vnd Aſẜins
nhe gir töw to ẜatziyuẜchi / bett manns Tähws Debbeſẜies.
Vnd es ẜacku töw arridſan / tu eſẜi Peteris / vnd vs ſcho
czeetu Ackmini ghribbu es vstaiſẜiet ẜawu Drauds / vnd
