Vnd ghribbu töw tahß Däbbäſẜo=wallſtibas Atzläghas
doht / Wiß ko tu vs Semmes ẜeeſẜi / buhß arridſan
Debbeſẜies ẜeetam buht / vnd wiß ko tu vs Semmes attẜeeſẜi
/ buhß arridſan Debbeſẜies attẜeetam buht. Tad aißleedſe
wings ẜaweems Mahzekļeems / ka teems nhe by
nhe weenam ẜatziet / ka wings JEſus / tas Chriſtus äſẜohtz.
Epiſtel am Tage Mariae Heimsuchung
Rom. 12. vide Dnic. 2. nach der Erſchei-
nung CHriſti.
Evangelium am Tage Mariae Heimſu-
chung / Luc. 1.
MAria mettehß kahyop tannies Deenahß / vnd ghaya
par to Kallnu tickuſche / vs to Pili Juda / vnd
nahze eekſchan to Nammu Zacharias / vnd ſweizenaya
Eliſabeth. Vnd tas notickahß / kad Eliſabeth to ſweizenaſchanu
Mariae dſirrdeya / deedams lehze tas Bährns
winja Meeſẜahß. Vnd Eliſabeth tappa no to ſwähtu
Gharru pilla / vnd brehze
ſtippre / ẜatzidama: Teickta
eſẜi tu no tahms Ꞩeewahms
/ vnd teickta gir ta
Aughle tawas Meeſẜas /
vnd no kurrenes tas mann
nahkahß / ka tha Mahte
manna Kungha py mann
nahk? Redſi / kad es to
ballxni tawas ſweizenaſchanas dſirrdeyu / preezadammees
lähze tas Bährns mannahß Meeſẜahß. Vnd O
ſwähta eſẜi tu / kattra tu titzeyuſẜi eſẜi / aiſto tas taps peepilldietz
/ kas töw ẜatzietz gir no to Kungu.
Vnd Maria ẜatziya:
Manna Dwehſẜele teitz to Kunghu / vnd mans Gharrs
epreehzeenayahß par to Deewu mannu Peſtitayu.
Aiſto tas gir to Sämmoſchanu ẜawas Kallpones
vsraudſiyis / Redſi no ſcho laiku mann ſwätu teix wiſẜi
Bährno Bährni.
Aiſto tas gir leelu leethu py man darriyis / katters
Spehziex gir / vnd kattra wahrtz Swähtz gir.
Vnd winja Schälaſtiba palleek no weenas Czilltas
ihs ohtras / py teems / kattri to biya.
Tas gir ſpehziex ar ẜawu Ällkonu / vnd ißkaiſẜa tohß
kattri gräſni gir ẜawas Ꞩirdtz prahta.
Tas gruhſch tohß Spehzigus no to Kräſlu / vnd
pazeļļ tohs Sämmoſchus aukſcham.
Tohß Jßallkuſchus peepillda tas arr Labbibu / vnd
attſtay tohs Baggatus tuckſchus.
Tas peeminn tahs ſchälaſtibas / vnd vspallieds ẜawam
Kallpam Jſrael.
Ka tas gir runnayis muhſẜeems Tähweems / Abraham
vnd winja Ꞩäklam muhſchige.
Vnd Maria palicka py tahs py trims Mehneſẜeems
/ pehtz greeſehs ta attkal vs Mahyu.
Epiſtel am S. Michaelis tage /
Apocal. 12.
WEens Karrſch pazehlees ẜöw Debbeſẜies / Mickelis
vnd winja Engeļi Karŗoya ar to Satahna /
vnd tas Sathanas Karŗoya / vnd winja Engeļi / vnd nhe
vswahreya / neds arridſan winjo Weeta tappa Debbeſẜies
attraſta. Vnd tas leels Puhgkis / ta wätza Tſchuhßka
/ kattrai wahrtz gir tas Wälls vnd Sathanas tappa
ißmäſtz / katters wiſẜu to Paſẜaul ar Wiltu wadda / vnd
tappa mäſtz wirſẜon Semmes / vnd winja Engeļi tappa
arridſan nomäſti.
Vnd es dſirrdeyu weenu leelu ballxne / ta ẜatziya
Debbeſẜies / Nu gir ta Peſtiſchana / vnd tas Spähx / vnd
ta Wallſtiba / vnd ta Warra muhſẜa Deewa / ẜawa
CHriſtus tappuſẜi / tapehtz ka tas ißmäſtz gir / katters
tohß apẜuhdſeya Deenas vnd Nacktis preekſchan Deewu.
Vnd tee gir to vswarreyuſchi czaur ta Jähra Aſẜini
/ vnd czaur to Wahrdu ẜawas leezibas / vnd nhe gir
ẜawu dſiewibu mieļoyuſchi / ihs to Nahwu. Tapehtz
liexmoyeetees juhs Debbeſẜes / vnd kattri tur eekſchan
dſiewo.
Evangelium am tage S. Micha?lis /
Matth. 18.
TEe Mahzekli ghaya
py JEſu vnd ẜatziyaẜaiya:
Kas gir tas Prawakais
Debbeſẜo=Wallſtibà? JEſus
aizenaya weenu Bährnu
py ẜöw / vnd wedde to
widdu ſtarrpan teems / vnd
ẜatziya: Pattees / es ẜacku
jums / Ja juhß nhe apghreſchatees
/ vnd tohpeeta ka
tee Bährni / tad juhß
Debbeſẜo=Wallſtibà nhe
nahxeta. Kas ẜöw pattz ẜämmoyahß ka ſchis Bährns /
tas gir tas Prahwakays Debbeſẜo=wallſtiba / vnd kas
tahdu Bährnu vsjämm eekſchan mannu Wahrdu / tas
vsjämm mann. Bett kas weenu no ſcheems wiſẜeems
maſakeems apghrehzi / kattri eekſchan mann titz / tam
buhtu labbahk / ka tam weens Dſirna=ackminns py winja
Riekles pakahrtz taptu / vnd apſlietzenahtz taptu Juhri
/ kurr wißdſiļļahk gir.
Way tai Paſẜaulei tahs apghrehzibas dehļ. Apghrehzibai
buhß jo nahkt / bett tomähr way tam Czillwäkam
/ czaur kattru Apghrehziba nahk. Bett ja töw tawa
Rohka jeb tawa Kahya Karrina / no czehrt to / vnd
mett to no ẜöw / tas gir töw labbahk / ka tu eekſchan dſiewoſchanas
Tiſlis / jeb Krohplis ee=ey / nhe ka töw diwi
Rohkas / jeb Kahjas gir / vnd tohpi eekſchan to muhſchigu
Vgguni ee=mäſts. Vnd ja töw tawa Atz Karrina
/ ißrau to aran / vnd mett to no ẜöw / tas gir töw labbahk
/ ka tu ar weenu Atzi eekſchan dſiewoſchanas ee=ey /
nhe ka töw diwi Atzis gir / vnd tohpi Elles Vgguny eemäſts.
Peeraughaita / ka juhß nhe weenu no ſcheems nitzinayeeta:
Aiſto es ẜacku jums: Winjo Engeļi Debbeſẜies
/ räds allaſchien to Waighu manna Tähwa Debbeſẜies.
Aiſto tha Czillwäka Dähls gir natzis / ſwähtus
darriet tohs kattri paſudduſchi gir.
Evangelium von der Tauffe Chriſti /
Matth. 3. Cap.
TAnny laikà nahze JEſus aran Galileeŗo Semmes
/ py to (vppi) Jordan py Jani / ka tas ẜöw no to
licktees Kruſtitees. Bett Janis leedſe tam / vnd ẜatziya
/ Mann buhtu ghan wayaga biyis / ka es no töw Kruſtietz
taptu / vnd tu nahz py mann? Bett JEſus adbildeya
/ ẜatzidams vs to: Laid nu to tha buht / tha peeklayahß
mums wiſẜu Taißnibu peepilldiet. Tad ļahwe
wings tam.
Vnd kad JEſus Kruſtietz by / ißkahpe Wings dries
aran to Vdeni. Vnd redſi / tad attwehrehß tas Debbeß
par Winju. Vnd Janis redſeya to Deewa Gharru /
ihten ka kahdu Ballodi ſemmeh nolaiſchohtz / vnd par
winyu nahkam. Vnd redſi weens Ballxnis no Debbes
ẜatziya: Schiß gir manns mieļais Dähls / py kattru
mann labbs Prahtz gir (vel, katters mann pattiek.)
Evangelium am Friedenstage / welcher
Jährlich im Fürſtenthumb Churland vnd Semgallen /
auff anordnung Fürſtl. Durchl. Hertzog Gotthardts /
etc.
Chriſt-
milder gedächtniß / wegen des zwiſchen dem Pohlen vnd Moßcovi-
ter / betrffend den Lieffländiſchen Krieg / anno 1582. durch ſonderba-
re ſchickung Gottes / getroffen Friedens / den 15. Januarii
feyerlich gehalten wird.
Luc. 13. Cap.
TAnny laykà paſluddenaya zitti tam Kungam JEſu
no teems Galileeŗeems / kattro Aſẜini Pilatus ar winyo
Vpperi ẜajautzis by. Vnd JEſus adbilldeya vnd ẜatziya vs
teems: Skeetaht juhß / ka ſchee Galileeŗi par wiſẜeems Galileeŗeems
Ghräzeneeki biyuſſchi gir tapehtz kad tee to zeetuſſchi gir? Es
ẜacku / Nhe / Bett ja juhß nhe tapſẜeeta labbaki / tad irr juhß wiſẜi arridſan
tha tapſẜeeta nomaitati. Jeb ſkeetaht juhß / ka tee aſtohņpadeßmitti
/ vs kattreemskattrerms tas Thurnis eekſchan Siloha kritta / vnd
noẜitta tohß / gir noſeguſſchi par wiſẜeems Czillwäkeems / kattri eekſchan
Jeruſalemes dſiewo? Es ẜacku / Nhe: Bett ja juhß
nhe tapſẜeeta labbaki / tad irr juhß wiſẜi arridſan
tha tapſẜeeta nomaitati.
Die trawrige Hiſtoria der er-
bärmlichen
Zerſtörung der Statt
Jeruſalem / 40. Jahr nach des
HErren Chriſti leiden.
Hiebevor in Lettiſcher Sprache nie ge-
ſehen / itzo aber verſetzet
Durch
GEORGIVM MANCELIVM
Semgallum P.
Ad Zoilum:
Serviat omne DEO ſtudium, fremat Orbis & Orcus;
Rumpatur Momus: Sat placuiſſe Deo.
Cum Grat. & Privileg. Sereniſ. Reg. Svec.
Gedruckt zu Riga in Lieffland / durch vnd in
Verlegung Gerhard Schröders / 1631.
Hiſtoria
Von der Zerſtörung der
Statt Jeruſalem Lettiſch.
Kad tas laix daggaya / kad Deews ghribbeya
par Jeruſalem / vnd teems Juddo ļaudeems ẜawu Dußmibu
iß=krattiet / ka tee Proweetes / vnd tas Kunx Chriſtus
patz teems by draudeyuſchi / vnd papreekſch ẜatziyuſſchi
/ gir ſchahß Siemes pirrmahk rädſätas.
Py Däbbäſẜu gir weena Aſtita=Swaigſne rädſäta ka kahtz
Sohbens / kattra wiſẜu Ghaddas kahrtu par to Pili ſtahweya / vnd
ick=kattris Czillwähx to redſeya.
Jtt paſſchahß Leeldeenahs / app to aſtotu Stundu Nackty / 8.
Aprill gir py to Alltari Baſnizà tahß ſkaidris ſpohſch ghaiſchums
attſpiedeyis / ka ick=kattris ſkitta /Deenu äſẜam.
Weenas waŗŗas leelas ſtippras Wahrtis / eekſchan to eekſkigu
Baſnizu / kuŗŗas diwi deßmitteems Wiereems zelltt by / ghribbädami
tahs attdarriet / kattras ar ſtipprahms Atzläghams vnd Dſällſa=
klinckeems by apdarrinatas / gir ẜöw paſſchas app to ẜäßtu Stundu
Nackty attdarriyuſſchahß. 21.Junij. App Ꞩehna laiku gir rädſäti
Paddebbeſẜies Ratti=liddinayammees / vnd ka kahtz leels Spähx no
Jahtneekeems vnd Kahyeneekeems Paddebbeſẜies ẜa=eiyoht / vnd kohpa
kauyohtees nackty. To Deenu pirrms Waſẜaraſwähtkeems / kad
tee Baſnizaskungi eekſchan to Baſnizu ghribbeyuſchi ẜattaiſẜiet / kas
vs Ꞩwähtkeems wayadſeya / gir tee leelu dimbdu / vnd pehtz weenu
Ballxni dſirrdeyuſchi / katters gir brehzis / laideeta mums no ſchennenes
nohſt behkt. Jeb tomähr czitti ẜacka / tas äſẜohtz to laiku notitzis /
kad tas preekſchkarrayams Autz Baſnizà CHriſto mirrſtoht / gir ẜaplieſẜis.
Tur gir arridſan weens Czillwähx biyis / JEſus / Anani dähwähtz
/ nabbaga Wiera Dähls / tas patz nahkdams Jeruſalemeh vs
teems Waſẜaraſwähtkeems / gir ar leelu ſtippru Gharru brehzis: Ock
weena Kleekſchana no Auſtrumas / ock weena Kleekſchana no Wackara
puſẜes / ock weena Kleekſchana no tſchettreems Wehyeems / weena
Kleekſchana par wiſẜu Jeruſalem vnd to Baſnizu / weena leela
Waida par Bruht vnd Brudgamu / weena Kleekſchana par wiſẜeems
Ļaudeems. Vnd ta wings Deenas vnd Nacktis waideya / vnd ſkreya
ka trax apkahrt eekſchan to Pili. Vnd jebſche Winju zitti ar Pahtagahms
vnd Riextehms ſchaute / kattri ſchohß Wahrdus ka nhelabbus
par to Pili labpraht nhe dſirrdeya / tad to mähr Wings nhe zeete
kluß.
Vnd kad ſchiß Czillwähx preekſchan to Semmeſẜohgi nowäſts
gir / kattru tee Römeŗi eelickuſchi by / katters to arridſan ar Patagahms
ghauſche lieds patt Aſẜinim ſchauſt licka / tomähr nhe gir
Wings nhe ar weenu Wahrdu ſchälaſtibu luhdſees / nei kahdu Aſẜaru
ißlaidis / bett bes mitteſchanas wiſẜà ghallwà brehzis / Way / Way /
töw / O tu nabbaga Jeruſalem. Albinus tas Ꞩohgis gir to ka kahdu
Jegki ſmehyis. Bett ſchiß Czillwähx nhe gir ẜeptinyohß Ghaddohß
dauds ar Ļaudeems runnayis / bett allaſch weens ghayis / ka
kahtz Czillwähx kas ko labb ļohte py ẜöw paſſcham apdohma / vnd gir
allaſchien ſchohß Wahrdus brehzis / Way / Way töw / O tu nabbaga
Jeruſalem. Vnd no tahdas brehkſchanas nhe gir Wings apnitzis.
Vnd kad nu ta Pils no teems Römeŗeems gir apẜähſta biyuſẜi /
gir wings wirſẜu teems Muhreems apkahrt ſtaighayis / vnd allaſchien
brehzis / Way par ta Baſnizu / Way par wiſẜeems Ļaudeems.
Vnd wißpehdige gir wings arridſan ſchohß nhe=eraſtus Wahrdus
klaht ẜatziyis / Way irr mann. Vnd to ẜatzidams gir wings no nheyauſche
no to Waideneeko ſchaudiſchanu aisjämtz / vnd ta nomirris.
Schahß vnd zittas leelas Siemes gir papreekſch rädſätas /
pirms Jeruſalem ißpohſtita tappa. Nu ghribbam mehß no tahß
paſſchas ißpoſtiſchanas arridſan magkeniet runnaht.
Kad tee Juddi / ka Steppings ẜacka / ka Ꞩläppkawi vnd Willtineeki
/ to taißnu vnd nhenoſeeguſchu CHriſtum nokahwuſchi by /
gir tas ar wiſẜu to Juddo Wallſtibu eekſchan wiſẜahms leetahms allaſchien
nicknake tappis. Tee Auxtibaſnizaskungi eeẜahka / vnd darriya
Warru teems zitteems Baſnizaskungeems. Starrpa teems
zitteems auxteems Kungeems by wiſẜenada Eeniedeſchana / wiſẜas leetas
Wallſtibà taiſẜiyas vs Nheẜadderreſchanas / vnd by janomanna /
ka wiſẜahms leetahms by zittade tapt / vnd tai Wallſtibai ẜajuckt. No
tahdas Nheẜadderieſchanas vnd Eeniedeſchanas to auxto Kungo ẜawa
ſtarrpà czehlehß ẜahwahtz Pullx draux py draughu / vnd no to
attlehze wiſẜenada Nhelaimiba / leela Abpohſtiſchana vnd Släppkawiba
eekſchan Jeruſalemes vnd ara Pills / vnd wiſẜas leetas taiſẜiyahß
/ ka abbi Wallſtibas / Gharriga vnd Paſẜauliga / to Ļauſcho /
apkahrt kahrtim by greeſtam tapt. Tapehtz arridſan notickahß / ka
tas Keyſers Nero Ceſtium Wlorum Juddoſemmeh ee=ẜuhtiya / vnd
kad wings teems Juddeems ļohte barx by / ar dauds leetams / ẜawu
Nheghauſẜibu / leppnibu vnd Pahrghallwibu dſiedams / gir tee Juddi
winju ißdſinnuſchi / vnd kad wings ar teems kahwehß / gir winjam
peetz=tuhxtoſchi Wieri no ẜawu ſpähku apkawti. Tha trackoya tee
Juddi zaur Deewa lickumu / ka tee arridſan prett teems Römeŗeems
turreyahß / vnd teems nhe ghribbeya klauſẜiet. Bett kad tas Keiſers
Nero to ẜayutta / ẜuhtiya wings to Wlawium Weẜpaſianum ar
ẜawu Dählu Tito eekſchan Syria=ſemmes.
Vnd apkahrt to laiku gir eekẜchan wiſẜu Auſtruma pus / ka
arridſan Tranquillus raxta / Runnas iß=pauduſchi / ka ihten apkahrt
to laiku zitteems / kattri aran Judea nahktu / ļohte auxteems vnd
ſpehzigeems eekſchan wiſẜas Paſẜaules by tapt. Vnd jebſche tas py
to gharrigu Wallſtu Chriſti tha tees tappa / ka tas Wahrtz CHriſti
(katters peedſimmis gir no to Juddo tautu) zaur to Mahzibu
ta Ewangelij eekſchan wiſẜas Paſẜaules auxts tappa / tad gir tomähr
to zitti vs teems diweems Weſpaſianeems ghreeſuſchi. Bett tee Juddi
ghreeſe ſchohß Wahrdus vs ẜöw / kad teems ißdewehß daſchereis
ẜawus Waideneekus kaut / tappa tee läppni / zehle tries Wirrßneekus
/ ghribbädami to Pili Aſcalon ar Warru vsjembt / teitan gir
tee diweyohß Slacktinyohß apkauti / tee Wirrßneeki / vnd diwideßmittz
tuhxtoſchi Wieri.
Ta nu pehtz to dewehß Weſpaſianus vs tha Keiſeŗa pawehleſchanu
eekſchan Galileam / kattra weena Semme by pilla Ļauſcho /
ißpohſtiya wis zaur zaurim / vnd nhe by no Kauſchanas / Pohſtiſchanas
/ vnd Dädſenaſchanas ghalls / tad tappa dauds tuhxtoſchi
Juddi nokauti / weenà reiſà peetzdeßmittz tuhxtoſchi Wieri / bes
Ꞩeewahms / Bährneems / vnd Ļaudeems no Semmes. Tee Karŗa=
Wieri nhe gir teitan neds Wätzus neds Jaunus ſchäloyuſchi / ney
ghruhtas Ꞩeewas / ney Bährnus Schuhply. Ꞩeſſchus=tuhxtoſchus
Jaunus Wierus gir Weſpaſianus weenà reiſà / ka ẜawus paſſchus
muhſchigus Wahrgus / ſuhtiyis to gharŗu ſchauru Semm
Iſthmus
ſtarpan teems diweems Juhreems eekſchan Achaia ißrackt. Triesdesmitz=tuhxtoſchi
Karŗawieri to Juddo gir tanny laikà weenà reiſà
par muhſchigeems Wahrgeems pahrdohti. Peetztuhxtoſchi gir ẜöw
paſſchi no Jſẜamiſẜeſchanas no auxteems Kallneems no ghaſuſſchees.
Tanny laikà by weens auxtz Kunx / labbe mahziyees / ghuddris
vnd prahtiex / Baſnizaskunx ſtarpan teems Juddeems / vnd
weens no winjo Wirßneekeems Karŗà / ar wahrdu Joſeps. Vnd
kàd wings pirrmà Jßbaileh ar maſu Pullzinņu weenà Dohbeh (leela
Zauruma) bähgdams eeliedis by / py to Galileeŗo Pili / Jotapatra
noẜaukta / tappa wings Rohka dabbuitz / vnd py Weſpaſiano
wäſts. Vnd kad wings tam papreekſch ſluddenaya / tam by wehl
Keiſeŗam tapt / gir tas winju ſchäloyis. Vnd tas patz Joſeps gir
to raxtiyis / ko mehß no ſchahms leetahms ſinnam / Kad ſchis eekſchan
Galilea noticka / gir weens pullx Ļauſcho / nhebehdneeki /
Pohſtitayi ẜapullzeyuſſchees vnd vs Jeruſalem nahkuſchi / tohs
gir weens no teems auxteems Kungeems / Johannes / ẜakrahyis
/ ka tas zaur ſcho Pullku wiſẜu to Spähku dabbuitu. Tad
gir attkal dauds Släppkawibas / dauds Pohſtiſchanas / dauds
laupiſchanas eekſchan Jeruſalem notitzis / vnd gir wiſẜur leela nhelaime
rahdiyuſẜees / ta by ta nabbaga Pills leelahs bähdahs.
Tanny laikà gir zitti Auxtibaſnizaskungi nokauti / vnd daſchereis
aſẜinus ißleetz / irr paſſchà Baſnizà. Joſeps raxta / ka diwipadeßmitt=tuhxtoſchi
no wislabbakeems Muiſchneekeems to Juddo
ſchinny Dumpy nokauti gir / vnd winjo Mannta vnd Nammi
gir teems Kallpeems ißpohſtiet attlaiſti. Zitti ſkeet / to äſẜoſchi tee
Römeri ar Willtu darriyuſchi.
Tad by nu jaw tanny laikà / pirms wehl ta ihſtäna Auka vsghaya
/ Jeruſalem ar treyadu Nhelaim apdohta / ar wahrdu ar to
Karŗu to Römero Ļauſcho / ar Dumpi / vnd wiſẜenadu ẜakudenaſchanu
eekſchan Pili / vnd ar nickneems barrgheems Kungeems / kattri
ar Wiiltu weens pehtz ohtru paſſchi vsmettehß / vnd ghribbädami
Kungi buht / dauds Aſẜins ißleya.
Kad nu tanny laikà tee Gadareneri ļaudis teems Römereems prettie
turreyahß / by tam Weſpaſiaņam no to Seemaslegeri peepehſch
zelltees / vnd vsjehme to Pili Gadara / vnd zaur ẜawu Karŗakungu
Placidum apkahwe wings py trießdeßmitz=tuhxtoſcho Namneeko /
bähgoht / diwi tuhxtoſchus jehme wings zeetumà / zitti Ļaudis vnd
tas Pullx bähgoht eeghaſehß ẜöw eekſchan to Vppi Jordan / vnd
winjo nomirruſchas Meeſẜas gir eekſchan to Jordan Strauhmeh
noſkreyuſſchas lieds to Juhri Aſpaltiten / kattru ẜautz to nomirruſchu
Juhri / vnd tad gir winja pus Jordanes lieds Macheron /
wiſẜur tee Römeri par wiſẜeems Juddeems vsklieduſchi / vnd leelu
breeßmibu darriyuſchi. Kad nu Seemu iß=eiyoht tas Pawaſẜaris
attghaya / vnd Weſpaſianus dſirrdeya / ka Nero nomirris by / ghulleya
wings Caeſareà / vnd ſattaiſẜiyahß peepehſch / vnd gir wiſẜus Pilis
to Juddo vnd Jdumeero vsjehmis / beß zittus Pilis / kattrus zitti
ſweſſchi Karŗaļaudis turreya / vnd wiſẜur gir wings eekſchan tahms
Pilehms eeẜädenayis Römeŗo Karŗaļaudis / ka wings Jeruſalem /
kattra ween attlicka / jo lähtake vswarreht vnd vsjembt warrätu.
Vnd gir tanny laikà Weſpaſianus par Keiſeri vsmäſts / pehtz to ghaya
Wings eekſchan Egyptes / vnd no tennenes dſierehß wings eet eekſchan
Jtalien / vnd pa=wehleya tam Tito teekam to Spähku vnd
Karŗu prettie teems Juddeems. Bett Titus / ghribbädams kahdas
Weetas py Jeruſalem ißluhkoht / kad wings tuwe pee=jayis by / tick
iß=ſprucka / ka tas Juddo Rohkahß nhe tappa. Pehtz vs=ẜitta wings
